sentences.chinese: 海底

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture that you sleep on

sentences.english: Momma was cleaning inside, changing the bedclothes.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈在里面清扫，换卧具。

detailed_translations.english: the sheets, covers etc that you put on a bed

detailed_translations.chinese: 寝具；（建筑）[建] 基床；（家畜）草垫

sentences.english: a hotel with 50 bedrooms
sentences.chinese: 有50间客房的旅馆

detailed_translations.english: a room for sleeping in

detailed_translations.chinese: 两性关系的；城郊住宅区的

sentences.english: a swarm of bees
sentences.chinese: 一群蜜蜂

sentences.english: a bee sting
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂蜇伤

detailed_translations.english: a black and yellow flying insect that makes  honey  and can sting you

sentences.english: roast beef
sentences.chinese: 烤牛肉

sentences.english: We have both dairy and beef cattle on the farm.
sentences.chinese: 我们农场里奶牛和菜牛都有。

detailed_translations.english: the meat from a cow
to complain a lot

sentences.english: If they wanted to eat something sweet, they had tolocate a beehive, smoke out the bees and retrieve the honey, often byclimbing up a tree or chopping it down.
sentences.chinese: 如果他们想吃某些甜东西，就必须找到一个蜂箱，用烟把蜜蜂熏出来，取出蜂蜜，往往还要爬上树或把蜂窝砍下来。

sentences.english: The spirit of a beehive, the behavior of an economy, the thinking of a supercomputer, and the life in me are distributed over a multitude of smaller units (which themselves may be distributed).
sentences.chinese: 蜂窝精神，经济体的行为，超级电脑的思维，还有我内在的生命分布在众多更小的单元上（这些单元自身可能也会被再分布）。

sentences.english: Its other green initiatives have included a rooftop garden, beehive, and rooftop composting of the restaurant's food scraps. The nightclub has a landfill diversion rate of 89 percent.
sentences.chinese: 其他的绿色运动包括屋顶花园、蜂窝以及利用餐厅食物残渣在屋顶进行堆肥项目。这家夜总会的垃圾填埋转移率达到89%。

detailed_translations.english: a structure where  bee s  are kept for producing  honey

sentences.english: a pint of beer
sentences.chinese: 一品脱啤酒

sentences.english: We sell draught beer (=  beer served from a large container, not a bottle  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们出售散装啤酒。

detailed_translations.english: an alcoholic drink made from  malt  and  hop s

name: before
trans: prep. 在…以前；在…前面 ad. 以前 conj. 在…之前

sentences.english: The new road should be completed before the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 这条新公路应该在年底前完工。

sentences.english: Let’s meet at our house before the show.
sentences.chinese: 看演出前在我们家碰头吧。

sentences.english: Larry arrived home before me.
sentences.chinese: 拉里在我之前到家。

sentences.english: We only got back from Scotland the day before yesterday (=  two days ago  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们前天才从苏格兰回来。

sentences.english: Other students joined in the protest, and before long (=  soon  ) there was a crowd of 200 or so.
sentences.chinese: 其他学生也加入了抗议队伍，不久就有200人左右了。

detailed_translations.english: earlier than something or someone

sentences.english: She begged and pleaded with them until they finally agreed.
sentences.chinese: 她一再恳求，后来他们终于同意了。

sentences.english: She fought back the sudden urge to run to him and beg his forgiveness.
sentences.chinese: 她突然很想冲上去请求他原谅，但是她忍住了。

detailed_translations.english: to ask for something in an anxious or urgent way, because you want it very much

name: begin began begun
trans: v.开始,着手【一般现在 过去式 过去分词】

sentences.english: There’s a short poem at the beginning of every chapter.
sentences.chinese: 每一章的开头都有一首短诗。

sentences.english: From the beginning of my career as a journalist, I’ve been writing about gender issues.
sentences.chinese: 从我一开始干记者这一行，我就写性别议题的题材。

sentences.english: I thought he loved me; perhaps he did in the beginning .
sentences.chinese: 我以为他爱我，也许开始时他确实是爱我的。

sentences.english: That chance meeting marked the beginning of a long and happy relationship.
sentences.chinese: 那次邂逅展开了一段长久而幸福的关系。

sentences.english: This is just the beginning of a new and different life for you.
sentences.chinese: 这只是你新的别样生活的开始。

sentences.english: I said he would cause trouble, right from the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 我一开始就说过，他会惹事。

sentences.english: I opposed it from the very beginning.
sentences.chinese: 我一开始就反对。

sentences.english: The whole trip was a disaster from beginning to end.
sentences.chinese: 旅途从头到尾都在出乱子。

sentences.english: I think I have the beginnings of a cold.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉要感冒了。

sentences.english: He rose from humble beginnings to great wealth.
sentences.chinese: 他出身卑微，如今已腰缠万贯。

detailed_translations.english: the start or first part of an event, story, period of time etc

name: behalf
trans: n. 代表某人，为了某人

sentences.english: She asked the doctor to speak to her parents on her behalf.
sentences.chinese: 她请医生代她同她父母谈谈。

sentences.english: On behalf of everyone here, may I wish you a very happy retirement.
sentences.chinese: 请允许我代表在座的各位祝你退休后生活愉快。

detailed_translations.english: instead of someone, or as their representative

sentences.english: She behaved in a very responsible way .
sentences.chinese: 她表现得很有责任心。

sentences.english: I couldn't believe these people were behaving in this way.
sentences.chinese: 我无法相信这些人竟这样行事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表现，举止；运转，做出反应
detailed_translations.english: to do things that are good, bad, sensible etc
The way that you behave is the way that you do and say things, and the things that you do and say

sentences.english: It is important to reward good behaviour.
sentences.chinese: 表现好要给予奖励，这是很重要的。

detailed_translations.english: the things that a person or animal does

name: behind
trans: prep. (表示位置)在…后面 ad. 在后面；向后

sentences.english: I turned to speak to the person standing behind me.
sentences.chinese: 我转身和站在我后面的那人说话。

sentences.english: Someone could easily creep up behind us.
sentences.chinese: 很可能有人跟在我们后面。

sentences.english: The car behind was hooting impatiently.
sentences.chinese: 后面那辆车不耐烦地按着喇叭。

sentences.english: Jane shut the door behind her.
sentences.chinese: 简随手关上身后的门。

sentences.english: The manager was sitting behind a large desk.
sentences.chinese: 经理坐在一张大办公桌的后面。

detailed_translations.english: at or towards the back of a thing or person

sentences.english: a law that first came into being in 1912
sentences.chinese: 于1912年制定的一条法律

sentences.english: human beings
sentences.chinese: 人

detailed_translations.english: existence

sentences.english: I remember watching one of my tapes from 1991 when I went to Belgium and looked at myself speaking English.
sentences.chinese: 我记得我看过一盘我1991年的录像带，那时我刚到比利时，我看着我自己说英语的样子。

sentences.english: Someone once said: ‘beauty is in the eye of the beer holder’; if that’s the case, then Belgium is exquisite.
sentences.chinese: 有人曾经说过：“在手持啤酒的人眼中美丽无处不在。” 如果真的是这样，那么比利时就美艳至极了。

sentences.english: That is greater than the GDP of Belgium and Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 这超过了比利时和瑞典两国的国民收入。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比利时（西欧国家，首都布鲁塞尔Brussels）

sentences.english: a strong belief in God
sentences.chinese: 笃信上帝

sentences.english: When you get something wrong, it can shake your belief in yourself.
sentences.chinese: 如果有什么事情没做好，就会动摇你对自己的信心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that something is definitely true or definitely exists

sentences.english: You shouldn’t believe everything you read.
sentences.chinese: 你不应尽信书上看来的东西。

sentences.english: I believed him, even though his story sounded unlikely.
sentences.chinese: 我相信了他，尽管他的话听上去难以置信。

sentences.english: I don’t believe a word of it (=  I think it is completely untrue  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我一句话也不相信。

sentences.english: Did you honestly believe that I’d be stupid enough to do that?
sentences.chinese: 你真的认为我会傻到做那样的事情吗？。

detailed_translations.english: to be sure that something is true or that someone is telling the truth

name: bell
trans: n. 钟,铃;钟(铃)声;钟形物

sentences.english: church bells
sentences.chinese: 教堂的钟

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electrical equipment that makes a ringing sound, used as a signal or to get someone’s attention

sentences.english: She laid her hands on her swollen belly.
sentences.chinese: 她把手放在隆起的肚子上。

detailed_translations.english: the middle part of an animal’s body, near its stomach
to fill with air and become rounder in shape

sentences.english: The house had belonged to her family for three or four generations.
sentences.chinese: 这座房子属于她家已有三四代了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 属于，应归入；居住；适宜；应被放置
detailed_translations.english: If something belongs to you, you own it

sentences.english: an animal that lives below ground
sentences.chinese: 生活在地下的动物

sentences.english: Water was dripping onto the floor below.
sentences.chinese: 水滴到下面的地板上。

sentences.english: I could hear voices in the courtyard below my window.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到院子里有人在我的窗下说话。

sentences.english: They camped a few hundred feet below the summit.
sentences.chinese: 他们在山峰下面几百英尺的地方扎了营。

sentences.english: Down below, people were talking and laughing.
sentences.chinese: 下面，人们谈笑风生。

sentences.english: Somewhere far below, a door slammed.
sentences.chinese: 下面远远的什么地方有一扇门砰地关上了。

sentences.english: The kitchen is directly below her bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 厨房就在她卧室的正下方。

sentences.english: Captain Parker went below (=  to the lower level of the ship  ) , leaving Clooney in charge.
sentences.chinese: 帕克船长下去了，让克卢尼掌舵。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在下面，在较低处；在本页下面
detailed_translations.english: in a lower place or position, or on a lower level

sentences.english: He unbuckled his leather belt.
sentences.chinese: 他解开皮带。

detailed_translations.english: a band of leather, cloth etc that you wear around your waist to hold up your clothes or for decoration

detailed_translations.chinese: 用带子系住；用皮带抽打
detailed_translations.english: to fasten something with a belt

sentences.english: We sat on a park bench.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐在公园的长椅上。

detailed_translations.english: a long seat for two or more people, especially outdoors

name: bend bent bent
trans: adj. 弯曲的，变形的；vt. 使弯曲 【一般现在 过去式 过去分词】

sentences.english: The top layer should now point down to the layer beneath.
sentences.chinese: 现在，顶部图层应当有小箭头指向下面的图层。

sentences.english: The fortress on the hill covered the harbour area beneath.
sentences.chinese: 山上的炮楼把下面的海港地区置于射程之内。

sentences.english: They must all be drowning beneath him, in the watery caves of the rock!
sentences.chinese: 他们一定是在他下面的水里，就在那岩石充满了水的洞中游泳了！

detailed_translations.english: in or to a lower position than something, or directly under something

name: beneficial
trans: a. 有利的，有帮助的，有用的

sentences.english: a drug that has a beneficial effect on the immune system
sentences.chinese: 有益于免疫系统的一种药物

sentences.english: an arrangement that is mutually beneficial
sentences.chinese: 一项互惠互利的协定

detailed_translations.english: having a good effect

sentences.english: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

detailed_translations.english: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

detailed_translations.chinese: 利益，恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴
detailed_translations.english: money provided by the government to people who are sick, unemployed, or have little money

sentences.english: a bent nail
sentences.chinese: 弯曲的钉子

sentences.english: Stand with your knees slightly bent.
sentences.chinese: 双膝微曲站立。

sentences.english: He breathed in deeply, bent double in pain (=  with the top part of your body leaning forward towards your legs  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他深深地吸着气，痛得直不起腰来。

sentences.english: a bent old man (=  not standing straight  )
sentences.chinese: 一个驼背老汉

detailed_translations.english: special natural skill or interest in a particular area
no longer straight

sentences.english: Wendy came up and sat beside me.
sentences.chinese: 温迪走过来，坐在我身边。

sentences.english: the table beside the bed
sentences.chinese: 床边的桌子

sentences.english: I was standing right beside her at the time.
sentences.chinese: 当时我就站在她的旁边。

detailed_translations.english: next to or very close to the side of someone or something

name: besides
trans: prep. 除…以外（还有） ad. 还有，此外

sentences.english: I need the money. And besides, when I agree to do something, I do it.
sentences.chinese: 我需要这笔钱，而且，我一旦答应做什么事情就会做到。

sentences.english: The area has stunning scenery, beautiful beaches, and much more besides.
sentences.chinese: 那个地方有迷人的景色、美丽的沙滩，除此之外还有很多很多。

detailed_translations.english: used when adding another reason

name: best
trans: a. & ad.最好的；最好地，最 n. 最好的（人或物）

sentences.english: He won the best actor award.
sentences.chinese: 他获得最佳男演员奖。

sentences.english: What’s the best way to cook this fish?
sentences.chinese: 这鱼怎么烧最好？

sentences.english: The best thing to do is to stop worrying.
sentences.chinese: 最好的办法就是不要再担心。

sentences.english: Our pilots are given the best possible training.
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞行员接受最好的训练。

sentences.english: We use only the very best ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 我们只用最好的原料。

detailed_translations.english: better than anything else or anyone else in quality, skill, how effective it is etc

sentences.english: By mid-August the book was a bestseller.
sentences.chinese: 到8月中旬，这本书已经是畅销书了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 畅销书；畅销书作者；畅销商品（等于best seller）
detailed_translations.english: A bestseller is a book of which a great number of copies has been sold

name: better
trans: a.& ad. 较好的，更好的；好些； 更好地；更，更多n. 较好的事物；较优者 v. 改善；胜过

sentences.english: Your stereo is better than mine.
sentences.chinese: 你的音响比我的好。

sentences.english: There must be a better way to do this.
sentences.chinese: 一定还有更好的办法来做这件事。

sentences.english: He can speak French a lot better than I can.
sentences.chinese: 他法语讲得比我好多了。

detailed_translations.english: more useful, interesting, satisfactory, effective, suitable etc
to a higher standard or quality

sentences.english: He felt that she had betrayed him.
sentences.chinese: 他感觉她背叛了自己。

sentences.english: She had betrayed her parents' trust .
sentences.chinese: 她辜负了父母对她的信任。

sentences.english: I would never betray a confidence (=  tell a secret that someone has trusted me with  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我永远不会泄露秘密。

detailed_translations.chinese: 背叛， 出卖； 失信于， 辜负； 泄露； 暴露， 显露
detailed_translations.english: to be disloyal to someone who trusts you, so that they are harmed or upset

name: between
trans: prep. 在（两者）之间；在…中间

sentences.english: He supplements his regular meals by eating between meals.
sentences.chinese: 他在两餐之间吃点东西来补充正餐。

sentences.english: The object of these experiments was to find the connection, if any, between the two phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 这些实验的目的就是探索这两种现象之间的联系，如果存在着任何联系的话。

name: beyond
trans: prep. (表示位置) 在…的那边

sentences.english: They crossed the mountains and headed for the valleys beyond.
sentences.chinese: 他们翻过山，向更远处的山谷进发。

sentences.english: Beyond the river, cattle were grazing.
sentences.chinese: 河的那边，牛在吃草。

sentences.english: She drove through Westport, and stopped a few miles beyond at a wayside inn.
sentences.chinese: 她驱车穿过西港，在几英里外的一个路边旅馆停了下来。

detailed_translations.english: on or to the further side of something

sentences.english: Can James ride a bicycle yet?
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯会骑自行车了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with two wheels that you ride by pushing its pedals with your feet

name: bid
trans: v./ n. 出价，投标，向（某人）道别

sentences.english: the person who places the highest bid
sentences.chinese: 出价最高的人

sentences.english: We’ve made a bid of nearly £400 million for the company.
sentences.chinese: 我们出价近四亿英镑收购那家公司。

sentences.english: A takeover bid for the airline was launched today.
sentences.chinese: 今天有人出价收购该航空公司。

sentences.english: She bid £100 for a Victorian chair.
sentences.chinese: 她出价100英镑买一把维多利亚时代的椅子。

sentences.english: The two men ended up bidding against each other at the auction.
sentences.chinese: 结果那两个人在拍卖会上较起劲来。

detailed_translations.english: an offer to pay a particular price for something, especially at an  auction
to offer to pay a particular price for goods, especially in an auction

sentences.english: a big house
sentences.chinese: 大房子

sentences.english: I need a bigger desk.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一张大一点的桌子。

sentences.english: She had a big grin on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上挂着大大的笑容。

sentences.english: a big increase in crime
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率的大幅上升

sentences.english: Los Angeles is the biggest city in California.
sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是加利福尼亚最大的城市。

sentences.english: The garage isn’t big enough for two cars.
sentences.chinese: 这个车库不够大，停不下两辆汽车。

sentences.english: When they lose, they lose in a big way (=  to a large degree  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们要输就输得很惨。

sentences.english: There was this great big (=  extremely big  ) spider in the sink.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里有只特大的蜘蛛。

detailed_translations.english: of more than average size or amount

name: bill
trans: n.账单；法案，议案； （美）钞票，纸币

sentences.english: Have you paid the phone bill?
sentences.chinese: 电话费你付了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a written list showing how much you have to pay for services you have received, work that has been done etc

sentences.english: The final cost could be as much as one billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 最后的费用可能高达十亿美元。

detailed_translations.english: the number 1,000,000,000

sentences.english: Vera won £20 at bingo.
sentences.chinese: 薇拉玩宾戈赢了20英镑。

detailed_translations.english: a game played for money or prizes, in which numbers are chosen by chance and called out, and if you have the right numbers on your card, you win

sentences.english: ...the effects of air pollutants on the biochemistry of plants or animals.
sentences.chinese: …大气污染物对植物或动物生化过程的影响。

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of the chemistry of living things

sentences.english: ...recent biographies of Stalin.
sentences.chinese: …近年的斯大林传记。

detailed_translations.english: a book that tells what has happened in someone’s life, written by someone else

sentences.english: a degree in biology
sentences.chinese: 生物学学位

detailed_translations.english: the scientific study of living things

sentences.english: wild birds
sentences.chinese: 野鸟

sentences.english: The dawn was filled with the sound of birds.
sentences.chinese: 黎明时分，鸟鸣声不绝于耳。

sentences.english: a flock of birds
sentences.chinese: 一群飞鸟

sentences.english: a wooden bird cage
sentences.chinese: 木制鸟笼

detailed_translations.english: a creature with wings and feathers that can usually fly. Many birds sing and build nests, and female birds lay eggs

detailed_translations.chinese: 鸟笼；鸟笼状物；信号灯；宿舍
detailed_translations.english: A birdcage is a cage in which birds are kept

sentences.english: Congratulations on the birth of your daughter!
sentences.chinese: 恭喜你生了个女儿！

sentences.english: He only weighed 2 kilos at birth.
sentences.chinese: 他出生时体重只有两公斤。

sentences.english: Henry has been blind from birth.
sentences.chinese: 亨利先天失明。

sentences.english: What’s your date of birth ?
sentences.chinese: 你的出生日期是哪一天？

sentences.english: The exact place of birth is not recorded.
sentences.chinese: 确切的出生地没有记录。

sentences.english: They believe that the position of the planets at the time of birth determines the fate of the individual.
sentences.chinese: 他们相信，出生时的星象决定了一个人的命运。

sentences.english: More and more women are choosing to have home births.
sentences.chinese: 越来越多的女性选择在家分娩。

sentences.english: Smoking in pregnancy has been linked to premature birth.
sentences.chinese: 孕期吸烟已被认为与早产有关联。

sentences.english: the association between birth weight and blood pressure

detailed_translations.english: a man who works in business

sentences.chinese: …一个经营着自己的国际化妆品公司的成功的女商人。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who works in business

name: but
trans: conj. 但是，可是 prep. 除了, 除……外

sentences.english: It’s an old car, but it’s very reliable.

sentences.chinese: “他有经验吗？”“没有，但他非常好学。”

name: butcher
trans: n. vt. 肉店；屠夫 屠宰（动物）；残杀（人）

sentences.english: Pigs were butchered, hams were hung to dry from the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 猪被宰杀了，火腿吊在屋顶下风干。

detailed_translations.english: to kill animals and prepare them to be used as meat
A butcher is a shopkeeper who cuts up and sells meat. Some butchers also kill animals for meat and make foods such as sausages and meat pies.

sentences.english: Can I have some bread and butter?
sentences.chinese: 能给我一些面包和黄油吗?。

sentences.chinese: 你喜欢黄油吗？

sentences.english: Butterflies and moths are attracted to the wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶和飞蛾为野花所吸引。

sentences.chinese: 小的珍珠纽扣

trans: prep. 靠近，在…旁；在…时间；不迟于；被；用；由；乘（车）

sentences.chinese: 她站在窗边。

detailed_translations.chinese: 驾驶室；出租汽车；出租马车
detailed_translations.english: a taxi

sentences.chinese: 比起卷心菜我更喜欢豌豆。

sentences.chinese: 我们有卷心菜和羊肉。

sentences.chinese: 我们去了一间咖啡馆，在那儿消磨了整个下午。

sentences.chinese: 我们吃了蛋糕和冰激凌。

sentences.chinese: 最受欢迎的自然是驼色。

sentences.chinese: …将要经过装罐、去皮、切块或其他加工程序的水果和蔬菜。

sentences.chinese: 她在加拿大定居。

sentences.chinese: 他在加拿大已经住了二十多年了，现在完全加拿大化了。

sentences.chinese: 那么加拿大的政策呢？

sentences.chinese: 据信，逃亡者正向加拿大边界方向逃窜。

sentences.chinese: 大多数英国人都把美国音和加拿大音相提并论。

sentences.chinese: 我们沿着运河边往前走。

sentences.chinese: 巴拿马运河

sentences.chinese: 我们的航班取消了。

sentences.chinese: 恐怕我得取消我们明天的会议。

sentences.chinese: 现在许多癌症可以治愈。

sentences.chinese: 去年她得知自己患了癌症。

sentences.chinese: 上个月他死于癌症。

sentences.chinese: 总统候选人

sentences.chinese: 这次考试的应试者不可以使用计算器。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is being considered for a job or is competing in an election

sentences.chinese: 烛光在风中闪烁不定。

sentences.chinese: 一开始蜡烛摇曳不定， 然后就灭了。

sentences.chinese: 蜡烛只有半英寸长时，烛光忽闪忽闪地熄灭了，于是房间一片漆黑。

sentences.chinese: …一块糖果。

糖果（等于sweets）；冰糖（等于sugar candy，rock candy）；毒品
detailed_translations.english: Candy is sweet foods such as chocolate or toffees

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的（服饰）；甜言蜜语的

sentences.english: Rennie had eaten his supper in the canteen.
sentences.chinese: 伦尼已在食堂吃过晚饭。

detailed_translations.english: a place in a factory, school etc where meals are provided, usually quite cheaply

name: cap
trans: n. （无檐的或仅在前面有檐的）帽子；（瓶子的）盖；（钢笔等的）笔套

sentences.chinese: 棒球帽

sentences.english: a bottle cap
sentences.chinese: 瓶盖

sentences.chinese: 一座漂亮的金色圆顶塔

detailed_translations.english: a type of flat hat that has a curved part sticking out at the front, and is often worn as part of a uniform

sentences.english: capital investments

detailed_translations.english: relating to money that you use to start a business or to make more money

sentences.english: a space capsule orbiting the Earth
sentences.chinese: 沿地球轨道飞行的太空舱

name: captain

sentences.chinese: 机长和全体机组人员欢迎各位乘坐本次航班。

sentences.english: He captained the winning team in 1991.
sentences.chinese: 他于1991年率队夺得胜利。

detailed_translations.english: the sailor in charge of a ship, or the pilot in charge of an aircraft

name: caption
trans: n. （图片，漫画等的）说明文字

sentences.english: The local paper featured me standing on a stepladder with a caption, "Wendy climbs the ladder to success."
sentences.chinese: 当地的报纸刊登了一幅我站在活梯上的特写，下面写着：“温迪登上了成功之梯。”

detailed_translations.english: words printed above or below a picture in a book or newspaper or on a television screen to explain what the picture is showing

sentences.english: Dan got out of the car and locked the door.
sentences.chinese: 丹下了车，锁上车门。

sentences.english: He isn’t old enough to drive a car.
sentences.chinese: 他还未到可以开车的年龄。

sentences.english: Coughlan was killed in a car accident.
sentences.chinese: 科赫兰死于一场车祸。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle with four wheels and an engine, that can carry a small number of passengers

sentences.english: I dread to think what the carbon footprint must be like of moving that coal but we have no choice.
sentences.chinese: 我都不敢想象为了运这些煤产生了多少碳足迹，但我们没有选择。

sentences.chinese: 由于猎杀鲸鱼，鲨鱼和大型鱼类，我们也就减少了碳在这些物种群的储存量。

sentences.english: Across the world, forests and the soil beneath them absorb about a quarter of all carbon emissions.
sentences.chinese: 纵观全球，森林与它们脚下的土壤能吸收大约碳排放总量的四分之一。

sentences.english: Employees must show their identity cards at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 雇员在大门口必须出示自己的身份卡。

sentences.english: I haven’t got my membership card yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还没拿到会员卡。

sentences.english: a piece of card
sentences.chinese: 一张卡片纸

sentences.english: My name’s Adam Carver. Here’s my card.
sentences.chinese: 我叫亚当•卡弗，这是我的名片。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of plastic or paper containing information about a person or showing, for example, that they belong to a particular organization, club etc

name: care
trans: n. 照料，保护；小心v. 介意……，在乎；关心

sentences.english: ‘He looked angry.’ ‘ I don’t care !’
sentences.chinese: “他好像很生气。”“我不管！”

sentences.english: She felt that nobody cared.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得没有人在乎。

sentences.english: The picture had been drawn with great care.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图画得非常用心。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is important, so that you are interested in it, worried about it etc
when you are careful to avoid damage, mistakes etc

sentences.english: Any school trip requires careful planning.
sentences.chinese: 学校的任何出游活动都需要周密的安排。

detailed_translations.english: giving a lot of attention to details

name: careless
trans: a. 粗心的，漫不经心的

sentences.english: It was careless of him to leave the door unlocked.
sentences.chinese: 他忘了锁门，真是粗心大意。

sentences.english: a careless mistake
sentences.chinese: 粗心造成的错误

sentences.english: careless driving
sentences.chinese: 粗心驾驶

sentences.english: Careless talk can be disastrous for a business.
sentences.chinese: 谈话不慎有时会给企业带来灾难性的损失。

sentences.english: She gave a careless shrug.
sentences.chinese: 她漠然地耸了耸肩。

detailed_translations.english: not paying enough attention to what you are doing, so that you make mistakes, damage things etc

sentences.english: He is a carpenter by profession.
sentences.chinese: 他以木工为业。

sentences.chinese: 警方掌握的权力和资金

detailed_translations.english: (of sb in a position of authority) to tell sb to do sth

sentences.english: Have you any comment to make about the cause of the disaster?
sentences.chinese: 你对发生灾难的原因有何评论？

sentences.english: The results are a clear comment on government education policy.
sentences.chinese: 这些结果是对政府教育政策明显的批评。

detailed_translations.english: an opinion that you express about someone or something

sentences.english: Our top priorities must be profit and commercial growth.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须把利润和贸易增长作为我们的第一要务。

detailed_translations.chinese: 商业的， 商务的； 商品化的， 商业性的
detailed_translations.english: related to business and the buying and selling of goods and services

sentences.english: Women commit fewer crimes than men.
sentences.chinese: 女性犯罪比男性少。

detailed_translations.chinese: 犯， 干； 使承诺； 把…托付给； 调拨…供使用， 拨出
detailed_translations.english: to do something wrong or illegal

sentences.english: Are you ready to make a long-term commitment ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否准备好作出长久的承诺？

detailed_translations.english: a promise to do something or to behave in a particular way

sentences.english: a committee meeting
sentences.chinese: 委员会会议

detailed_translations.english: a group of people chosen to do a particular job, make decisions etc

sentences.english: Heart disease is one of the commonest causes of death.
sentences.chinese: 心脏病是最常见的死因之一。

sentences.english: They share a common interest in photography.
sentences.chinese: 他们在摄影方面兴趣相投。

detailed_translations.english: happening often and to many people or in many places

name: communicate
trans: v. 交际；传达（感情，信息等）

sentences.english: We communicated mostly by e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 我们主要是用电子邮件沟通。

sentences.english: A baby communicates its needs by crying.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿用哭来表达需要。

detailed_translations.english: to exchange information or conversation with other people, using words, signs, writing etc

sentences.english: Radio was the pilot’s only means of communication.
sentences.chinese: 无线电是飞行员唯一的通信手段。

sentences.english: There has been a breakdown in communication (= failure to communicate ) .
sentences.chinese: 沟通失败。

sentences.english: Paris has good communications with many European cities.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎与许多欧洲城市之间交通便捷。

detailed_translations.english: the process by which people exchange information or express their thoughts and feelings

sentences.english: ...the ultimate triumph of communism in the world.
sentences.chinese: …共产主义在全世界的最终胜利。

detailed_translations.english: a political system in which the government controls the production of all food and goods, and there is no privately owned property

name: communist
trans: n. 共产主义者 a. 共产党的；共产主义的

sentences.english: Without the communists in France, the resistance might not have succeeded in World War II.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有法国的共产主义者，二战中的抵抗运动可能不会成功。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is a member of a political party that supports communism, or who believes in communism
relating to communism

sentences.english: For ten years he had been her constant companion .
sentences.chinese: 十年来他一直陪伴她左右。

sentences.english: His dog became his closest companion .
sentences.chinese: 他的狗成了他最亲密的伙伴。

sentences.english: a travelling companion
sentences.chinese: 旅伴

detailed_translations.english: someone you spend a lot of time with, especially a friend

sentences.english: Which company do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪家公司上班？

sentences.english: I called the phone company about the bill.
sentences.chinese: 我就电话账单的事给电话公司打了电话。

sentences.english: The company was set up just after the war.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司是战后不久成立的。

sentences.english: People judge you by the company you keep (= the people you spend time with ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们根据你交往的朋友来判断你的为人。

detailed_translations.english: a business organization that makes or sells goods or services

sentences.english: The report compares the different types of home computer available.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告比较了市场上不同类型的家用计算机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比较， 对照； 把…比作
detailed_translations.english: to consider two or more things or people, in order to show how they are similar or different

sentences.english: a map and compass
sentences.chinese: 地图和指南针

detailed_translations.english: an instrument that shows directions and has a needle that always points north

sentences.english: the government’s promise to compensate victims of the flood
sentences.chinese: 政府对水灾灾民给予补偿的许诺

sentences.english: The firm will compensate workers for their loss of earnings.
sentences.chinese: 公司将补偿工人的收入损失。

detailed_translations.english: to pay someone money because they have suffered injury, loss, or damage

sentences.english: The banks have long competed with American Express's charge cards and various shop cards.
sentences.chinese: 这些银行长期以来一直与美国运通公司的记账卡和各种商店卡竞争。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比赛， 竞争， 对抗
detailed_translations.english: if one company or country competes with another, it tries to get people to buy its goods or servicesrather than those available from another company or country

sentences.english: Typing is considered by most employers to be a basic competence.
sentences.chinese: 大多数雇主认为打字是一项基本技能。

detailed_translations.chinese: 能力，胜任；权限；作证能力；足以过舒适生活的收入
detailed_translations.english: the ability to do something well

sentences.english: Going to trade fairs is an ideal opportunity to size up the competition .
sentences.chinese: 参加商品交易会是估量竞争规模的理想机会。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which people or organizations try to be more successful than other people or organizations

sentences.english: Last year they sold twice as many computers as their competitors.
sentences.chinese: 去年他们的计算机销量是竞争对手的两倍。

detailed_translations.english: a person, team, company etc that is competing with another

name: complete
trans: a. 完成vt. 完成，结束

sentences.english: Students must complete the course.
sentences.chinese: 学生必须学完这门课程。

sentences.english: The building took two years to complete.
sentences.chinese: 这幢大楼花了两年时间才完工。

sentences.english: The darkness was almost complete.
sentences.chinese: 几乎是漆黑一片。

sentences.english: a complete stranger
sentences.chinese: 一个完全陌生的人

detailed_translations.english: to finish doing or making something, especially when it has taken a long time
used to emphasize that a quality or situation is as great as it could possibly be

name: complex
trans: a. / n. 复杂的，建筑群

sentences.english: a complex system of highways
sentences.chinese: 复杂的公路网

sentences.english: Photosynthesis is a highly complex process.
sentences.chinese: 光合作用是一个非常复杂的过程。

sentences.english: Peter seemed to have an instant understanding of the most complex issues.
sentences.chinese: 再复杂的问题彼得似乎也是一看就明白。

sentences.english: It was a very complex relationship between two complex people.
sentences.chinese: 这是两个复杂的人之间非常复杂的关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由许多部分组成的，复合的；复杂的，难懂的
detailed_translations.english: consisting of many different parts and often difficult to understand

detailed_translations.chinese: 综合体， 集合体； 情结， 夸大的情绪反应
detailed_translations.english: a group of buildings, or a large building with many parts, used for a particular purpose

sentences.english: Gorbachev failed to keep the component parts of the Soviet Union together.
sentences.chinese: 戈尔巴乔夫没能使苏联各组成部分保持在一起。

detailed_translations.english: the component parts of something are the parts that it consists of
one of several parts that together make up a whole machine, system etc

sentences.english: Some minerals have complex chemical compositions.
sentences.chinese: 有些矿物的化学构成很复杂。

sentences.english: a composition by jazzman Dave Brubeck, called ‘Chromatic Fantasy’
sentences.chinese: 爵士音乐家戴夫•布鲁贝克的作品《半音阶幻想曲》

sentences.english: The Journals contain accounts of literary composition.
sentences.chinese: 《期刊》中有关于文学创作的报道。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which something is made up of different parts, things, or members

sentences.english: Why you let her talk you into doing such a foolish thing is beyond my comprehension (= impossible for me to understand ) .
sentences.chinese: 你怎么会被她说服去做这种蠢事，我实在是无法理解。

detailed_translations.chinese: 理解， 理解力， 领悟； 理解力测验
detailed_translations.english: the ability to understand something

sentences.english: She admitted that she was unable to compromise.
sentences.chinese: 她承认自己无法作出妥协。

detailed_translations.chinese: 妥协； 危及； 放弃
detailed_translations.english: to reach an agreement in which everyone involved accepts less than what they wanted at first
an agreement that is achieved after everyone involved accepts less than what they wanted at first, or the act of making this agreement

sentences.english: the threat of compulsory redundancies
sentences.chinese: 强制性裁员的威胁

sentences.english: Car insurance is compulsory.
sentences.chinese: 汽车保险是强制性的。

detailed_translations.english: that must be done because of a law or a rule

sentences.english: a huge global computer network
sentences.chinese: 巨大的全球计算机网络

sentences.english: the latest computer software
sentences.chinese: 最新的计算机软件

detailed_translations.english: an electronic machine that stores information and uses programs to help you find, organize, or change the information

sentences.english: He misses his comrades from his days in the army.
sentences.chinese: 他想念在部队时候的战友。

sentences.english: Comrades, please support this motion.
sentences.chinese: 同志们，请支持这项动议。

detailed_translations.english: a friend, especially someone who shares difficult work or danger

sentences.english: Now please concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 现在请集中注意力。

sentences.english: Adrian was finding it difficult to concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 阿德里安觉得自己很难集中注意力。

sentences.english: Italian industry is concentrated mainly in the north.
sentences.chinese: 意大利的工业主要集中在北部。

sentences.english: orange juice made from concentrate
sentences.chinese: 用浓缩橙汁冲兑的橙汁

detailed_translations.english: to think very carefully about something that you are doing

sentences.english: a new concept in business travel
sentences.chinese: 商务旅行的新理念

sentences.english: our basic concepts of decent human behaviour
sentences.chinese: 我们对得体的人类行为的基本观念

sentences.english: It’s very simple, once you grasp the concept .
sentences.chinese: 你一旦掌握了这个概念之后就很简单了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 概念， 观念； 设想
detailed_translations.english: an idea of how something is, or how something should be done

sentences.english: He was moved by her obvious concern.
sentences.chinese: 她明显的关心使他感动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 关切的事，有关的事；关心，挂念；关系，关联；公司，企业
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of wanting someone to be happy and healthy

detailed_translations.chinese: 涉及， 有关； 使关心， 使担心
detailed_translations.english: if a story, book, report etc concerns someone or something, it is about them

sentences.english: a rock concert
sentences.chinese: 摇滚音乐会

sentences.english: a concert of French choral music
sentences.chinese: 法国合唱音乐会

sentences.english: We were going to a concert in Bath Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去听一场在巴斯修道院内举行的音乐会。

sentences.english: She still does about 100 concerts every year.
sentences.chinese: 她每年仍然举行100场左右的演唱会。

detailed_translations.english: a performance given by musicians or singers

detailed_translations.chinese: 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的

sentences.english: When the investigation is concluded, the results will be sent to the US Attorney’s office.
sentences.chinese: 等到调查结束后，结果会被送到联邦检察官办公室。

sentences.english: Francis, having concluded his business with James, left for Miami.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯完成了和詹姆斯的买卖后就去了迈阿密。

detailed_translations.english: to complete something you have been doing, especially for a long time

detailed_translations.chinese: 推断出，推论出；缔结，议定
detailed_translations.english: to decide that something is true after considering all the information you have

sentences.english: These are the report’s main conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.english: It is still too early to reach a conclusion on this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上作出结论还为时过早。

sentences.english: There are perhaps two main conclusions to be drawn from the above discussion.
sentences.chinese: 从以上的讨论也许可以得出两个主要的结论。

sentences.english: All the evidence pointed to the conclusion that he was guilty.
sentences.chinese: 所有证据都表明他是有罪的。

sentences.english: It’s important not to jump to conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 决不要贸然下结论。

sentences.english: The police came to the inescapable conclusion that the children had been murdered.
sentences.chinese: 警方得出了无法回避的结论: 这些儿童被谋杀了。

sentences.english: At the conclusion of the meeting, little progress had been made.
sentences.chinese: 会议开到最后，没有取得多少进展。

detailed_translations.english: something you decide after considering all the information you have

sentences.english: What does that mean in concrete terms ?
sentences.chinese: 具体来说那到底是什么意思？

sentences.english: the lack of any concrete evidence
sentences.chinese: 缺少具体证据的

sentences.english: a dialogue about concrete issues and problems
sentences.chinese: 有关具体事情和问题的对话

detailed_translations.english: definite and specific

sentences.english: Profits increased by £1.5m, despite the difficult economic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the state that something is in, especially how good or bad its physical state is

sentences.english: Politicians were quick to condemn the bombing.
sentences.chinese: 政治家们立即对爆炸事件进行了谴责。

sentences.english: He was found guilty and condemned to death.
sentences.chinese: 他被裁定有罪，判了死刑。

detailed_translations.english: to say very strongly that you do not approve of something or someone, especially because you think it is morally wrong

sentences.english: The Senator’s conduct is being investigated by the Ethics Committee.
sentences.chinese: 该参议员的行为正受到道德委员会的调查。

sentences.english: an inquiry into the conduct of the police
sentences.chinese: 对警方行为的调查

sentences.english: his arrest for disorderly conduct
sentences.chinese: 他因妨害治安行为而遭逮捕

detailed_translations.chinese: 举止， 行为； 指导； 管理； 实施
detailed_translations.english: the way someone behaves, especially in public, in their job etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 进行； 管理， 指挥， 引导； 传输， 传导
detailed_translations.english: to stand in front of a group of musicians or singers and direct their playing or singing

name: conductor
trans: n. 管理人；指导者；（车上的）售票员，列车员；乐队指挥

sentences.english: He showed his ticket to the conductor and got on.
sentences.chinese: 他向检票员出示了车票，然后上了车。

sentences.english: The conductor's eyes darted to Wilfred, then fixed on Michael again.
sentences.chinese: 乐队指挥飞快地扫了威尔弗雷德一眼，然后视线又落回到迈克尔身上。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to collect payments from passengers on a bus

sentences.english: Despite her disability, Philippa is very confident.
sentences.chinese: 菲莉帕虽然有残疾，却很自信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确信的， 肯定的； 自信的
detailed_translations.english: sure that something will happen in the way that you want or expect

sentences.english: a confidential government report
sentences.chinese: 一份机密的政府报告

sentences.english: Doctors are required to keep patients’ records completely confidential .
sentences.chinese: 医生必须对病人的病历完全保密。

sentences.english: The information will be regarded as strictly confidential (= completely confidential ) .
sentences.chinese: 这一信息将被视为绝对机密。

detailed_translations.english: spoken or written in secret and intended to be kept secret

sentences.english: Representatives from over 100 countries attended the International Peace Conference in Geneva.
sentences.chinese: 来自一百多个国家的代表出席了在日内瓦举行的国际和平大会。

detailed_translations.english: a large formal meeting where a lot of people discuss important matters such as business, politics, or science, especially for several days

sentences.english: New evidence has confirmed the first witness’s story.
sentences.chinese: 新的证据证实了第一个证人的说法。

sentences.english: To confirm my diagnosis I need to do some tests.
sentences.chinese: 为了证实我的诊断，我要做一些化验。

sentences.english: Could you confirm the dates we discussed?
sentences.chinese: 你能确认我们商讨过的日期吗？

sentences.english: After a six-month probationary period, her position was confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 经过六个月的试用期后，她获准正式担任该职。

detailed_translations.english: to state or show that sth is definitely true or correct, especially by providing evidence

sentences.english: the threat of industrial conflict in the coalfields
sentences.chinese: 煤田发生劳资纠纷的风险

sentences.english: Marx points out the potential conflicts below the surface of society.
sentences.chinese: 马克思指出了隐藏在社会表层之下的潜在矛盾。

sentences.english: His views on the literal truth of the Bible brought him into conflict with other Christian leaders.
sentences.chinese: 他坚持《圣经》字面真理的观点使他与其他的基督教领袖发生了冲突。

sentences.english: Doctors exercise considerable power and often come into conflict with politicians.
sentences.chinese: 医生行使很大的权力，常常和政客们发生冲突。

sentences.english: a lawyer specializing in conflict resolution
sentences.chinese: 专门解决纠纷的律师

detailed_translations.english: a state of disagreement or argument between people, groups, countries etc

sentences.english: People might well confuse the two products.
sentences.chinese: 人们很容易混淆这两种产品。

detailed_translations.english: to think wrongly that a person or thing is someone or something else

sentences.english: He never even stopped to congratulate me.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至没有过来向我祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them

sentences.english: letters of congratulation
sentences.chinese: 祝贺信

sentences.english: Give Oscar my congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 请向奥斯卡转达我的祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: when you tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them

sentences.english: We’d like two rooms with connecting doors (= doors that join the rooms ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们想要两个有门相通的房间。

sentences.english: I didn’t connect the two events in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 我心里没把这两件事联系起来。

detailed_translations.english: to join two or more things together

sentences.english: Police have so far failed to establish a connection between the two murders.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止警方尚未确定两宗凶杀案之间有关联。

sentences.english: The evidence was there in the file but no one made the connection .
sentences.chinese: 证据就在档案里，但没有人把它们联系起来。

sentences.english: Students often see little connection between school and the rest of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 学生往往看不到上学和今后生活的联系。

sentences.english: He demonstrated the close connection between social conditions and health.
sentences.chinese: 他证明了社会条件和健康之间的密切联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 连接； 联系； 连接物， 连接点； 亲戚
detailed_translations.english: the way in which two facts, ideas, events etc are related to each other, and one is affected or caused by the other

sentences.english: Well, at least I can face them all with a clear conscience (= the knowledge that you have done nothing wrong ) .
sentences.chinese: 好吧，至少我可以问心无愧地面对他们所有人。

sentences.english: I can’t tell you what to do – it’s a matter of conscience (= something that you must make a moral judgment about ) .
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你怎么办——这是良心问题。

sentences.english: a crisis of conscience among medical staff (= a situation in which it is very difficult to decide what is the right thing to do )
sentences.chinese: 医务人员中的良心危机

detailed_translations.english: the part of your mind that tells you whether what you are doing is morally right or wrong

sentences.english: The EU Council of Finance Ministers failed to reach a consensus on the pace of integration.
sentences.chinese: 欧盟财政部长会议未能就一体化的进度达成共识。

sentences.english: the current consensus of opinion
sentences.chinese: 目前观点上的一致

sentences.english: The general consensus was that technology was a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 大家都认为科技是好东西。

sentences.english: the consensus politics of the fifties
sentences.chinese: 50年代的共识政治

detailed_translations.english: an opinion that everyone in a group agrees with or accepts

sentences.english: Her lawyer said she understood the consequences of her actions and was prepared to go to jail.
sentences.chinese: 她的律师说她明白自己行为的后果并准备去坐牢。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens as a result of a particular action or set of conditions

name: conservation
trans: n 保存；（自然资源的）保护，管理

sentences.english: wildlife conservation
sentences.chinese: 野生生物保护

sentences.english: a local conservation group
sentences.chinese: 当地的一个环境保护团体

detailed_translations.english: the protection of natural things such as animals, plants, forests etc, to prevent them from being spoiled or destroyed

name: conservative
trans: a. 保守的，守旧的；保守主义的；谨慎的 n.保守的人，保守主义

sentences.english: a very conservative attitude to education
sentences.chinese: 对待教育非常守旧的态度

sentences.english: conservative views
sentences.chinese: 保守的观点

sentences.english: an argument between reformers and conservatives in the organization
sentences.chinese: 该组织内部的改革派和保守派之争

detailed_translations.english: not liking changes or new ideas
someone who does not like changes in politics, ideas, or fashion

sentences.english: We will have to consider your offer carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们得仔细考虑你的提议。

sentences.english: The local authority considered that the school did not meet requirements.
sentences.chinese: 当地政府认为这所学校达不到要求。

sentences.english: Have you considered my feelings?
sentences.chinese: 你考虑过我的感受吗？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something carefully, especially before making a choice or decision

sentences.english: He was always kind and considerate.
sentences.chinese: 他总是很善良，为别人着想。

detailed_translations.english: always thinking of what other people need or want and being careful not to upset them

sentences.english: proposals put forward for consideration
sentences.chinese: 提请考虑的建议

sentences.english: They’ve got no consideration for others.
sentences.chinese: 他们一点都不为别人着想。

detailed_translations.english: careful thought and attention, especially before making an official or important decision

sentences.english: My diet consisted almost exclusively of chocolate-covered cookies and glasses of milk.
sentences.chinese: 我的饮食几乎只包含裹上巧克力的曲奇饼和一杯杯牛奶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由…组成； 在于； 一致

name: consistent
trans: a. 一致的，始终如一的，连续的

sentences.english: We need to be consistent in our approach.
sentences.chinese: 我们在方法上要前后一致。

detailed_translations.english: always behaving in the same way or having the same attitudes, standards etc – usually used to show approval

sentences.english: There was a constant stream of visitors to the house.
sentences.chinese: 参观这幢房子的游客川流不息。

sentences.english: Amy lived in constant fear of being attacked.
sentences.chinese: 埃米一直生活在害怕遭到袭击的恐惧之中。

sentences.english: He kept in constant contact with his family while he was in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他在澳大利亚时一直和家人保持着联系。

sentences.english: travelling at a constant speed
sentences.chinese: 以恒定速度行驶

detailed_translations.english: happening regularly or all the time

name: constitution
trans: n. 宪法，章程，身体素质

sentences.english: The right to speak freely is written into the Constitution of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 言论自由的权利被写入美国宪法。

sentences.english: She’s got a strong constitution – she’ll recover in no time.
sentences.chinese: 她体质强壮，很快就会恢复。

sentences.english: What’s the chemical constitution of the dye?
sentences.chinese: 这种染料的化学成分是什么？

detailed_translations.english: a set of basic laws and principles that a country or organization is governed by

sentences.english: There are plans to construct a new road bridge across the river.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要建造一条新的跨河公路桥。

detailed_translations.english: to build something such as a house, bridge, road etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 建筑物； 构想； 观念
detailed_translations.english: an idea formed by combining several pieces of information or knowledge

sentences.english: a road construction project
sentences.chinese: 道路修建计划

sentences.english: construction workers
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人

detailed_translations.english: the process of building things such as houses, bridges, roads etc

sentences.english: If symptoms persist, consult a doctor without delay.
sentences.chinese: 如果症状持续的话，马上咨询医生。

sentences.english: Have you consulted a dictionary?
sentences.chinese: 你查过词典了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to ask for information or advice from someone because it is their job to know something

sentences.english: a management consultant
sentences.chinese: 管理顾问

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to give advice on a particular subject

name: consume
trans: v. 消耗，耗费（燃料，能量，时间等）

sentences.english: Some of the most efficient refrigerators consume 70 percent less electricity than traditional models.
sentences.chinese: 一些能效最高的冰箱比传统型号少消耗70%的电。

detailed_translations.english: To consume an amount of fuel, energy, or time means to use it up
to use time, energy, goods etc

sentences.english: The thieves stole a purse containing bank-notes.
sentences.chinese: 小偷们偷到了一个里面有钞票的钱包。

sentences.english: The museum contains a number of original artworks.
sentences.chinese: 这家博物馆藏有一些原创艺术品。

detailed_translations.english: if something such as a bag, box, or place contains something, that thing is inside it

sentences.english: ice cream in plastic containers
sentences.chinese: 塑料容器里的冰激凌

sentences.english: a container ship
sentences.chinese: 集装箱船

detailed_translations.english: something such as a box or bowl that you use to keep things in

name: contemporary
trans: a.属同时期的，同一时代的

sentences.english: She writes a lot of contemporary music for people like Whitney Houston.
sentences.chinese: 她为惠特尼·休斯敦等人创作大量当代音乐作品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 现代的， 当代的； 同时代的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to the present time

name: content
trans: a.甘愿的,满意的 n.内容

sentences.english: The content of the media course includes scripting, editing and camera work.
sentences.chinese: 大众传媒课程的内容包括稿件写作、剪辑和摄像操作。

detailed_translations.english: the ideas, facts, or opinions that are contained in a speech, piece of writing, film, programme etc

sentences.english: the continents of Asia and Africa
sentences.chinese: 亚洲及非洲大陆

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of land surrounded by sea
able to control your sexual desires

sentences.english: He will be continuing his education in the US.
sentences.chinese: 他将在美国继续求学。

sentences.english: 英文例句: I felt too sick to continue.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉很难受，无法继续下去了。

sentences.english: 英文例句:The road continues northwards to the border.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句: 这条路往北一直延伸到边境。

detailed_translations.english: to not stop happening, existing, or doing something

sentences.english: Deborah opened her mouth to contradict, but closed it again.
sentences.chinese: 黛博拉张口想要反驳，但又把嘴闭上了。

sentences.english: Dad just can’t bear to be contradicted.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸就是受不了有人反驳他。

sentences.english: The article flatly contradicts their claims.
sentences.chinese: 这篇文章断然驳斥他们的说法。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with something, especially by saying that the opposite is true

sentences.english: Customs officials have made a series of contradictory statements about the equipment.
sentences.chinese: 海关官员们对于这种设备做出了一系列相互矛盾的陈述。

detailed_translations.chinese: 矛盾的；反对的；反驳的；抗辩的
detailed_translations.english: two statements, beliefs etc that are contradictory are different and therefore cannot both be true or correct

name: contrary
trans: n. / a. 相反 相反的

sentences.english: Two contrary views emerged.
sentences.chinese: 出现了两种相反的观点。

sentences.english: The men shouted contrary orders.
sentences.chinese: 这些人大声喊叫的命令互相矛盾。

sentences.english: It wasn’t a good thing; on the contrary it was a huge mistake.
sentences.chinese: 那不是好事，恰恰相反，是个巨大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: contrary ideas, opinions, or actions are completely different and opposed to each other
used to add to a negative statement, to disagree with a negative statement by someone else, or to answer no to a question

sentences.english: The U.S. is contributing $4 billion in loans, credits, and grants.
sentences.chinese: 美国以信贷和赠与的方式捐助了40亿美元。

sentences.english: Local businesses have agreed to contribute.
sentences.chinese: 当地的公司已经同意捐助了。

detailed_translations.english: To contribute money or resources to something means to give money or resources to help pay for something or to help achieve a particular purpose

sentences.english: All the money has been raised by voluntary contribution.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些钱都是靠自愿捐献筹集的。

detailed_translations.english: something that you give or do in order to help something be successful

sentences.english: Police had to be called in to control the crowds.
sentences.chinese: 只好调来警察控制人群。

sentences.english: He controlled the urge to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他克制住笑的冲动。

sentences.english: The disease robs you of muscle control.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病会让你丧失肌肉控制力。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something do what you want, or make something happen in the way that you want
the ability or power to make someone or something do what you want or make something happen in the way you want

sentences.english: the controversial issue of welfare reform
sentences.chinese: 福利改革这一有争议的话题

sentences.english: a highly controversial (= very controversial ) plan to flood the valley in order to build a dam
sentences.chinese: 一个把山谷淹掉来建造水坝的极具争议的计划

sentences.english: He is a controversial figure (= person who does controversial things ) in the art world.
sentences.chinese: 他是艺术界极具争议的人物。

sentences.english: Ready meals sell well because of their convenience.
sentences.chinese: 即食餐因为方便销路好。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being suitable or useful for a particular purpose, especially by making something easier or saving you time

sentences.english: Mail-order catalogs are a convenient way to shop.
sentences.chinese: 使用邮购目录是一种方便的购物方式。

sentences.english: My secretary will call you to arrange a convenient time to meet.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会打电话给你安排一个方便的时间见面。

sentences.english: restaurants convenient for shops and theatres
sentences.chinese: 靠近商店和剧院的餐厅

detailed_translations.english: useful to you because it saves you time, or does not spoil your plans or cause you problems

name: conventional
trans: a. 依照惯例的，习惯的

sentences.english: Internet connections through conventional phone lines are fairly slow.
sentences.chinese: 通过传统的电话线来连接因特网速度很慢。

sentences.english: Bake for 20 minutes in a conventional oven; 8 in a microwave.
sentences.chinese: 在传统的烤炉中烘烤20分钟，在微波炉里则烤8分钟。

detailed_translations.english: a conventional method, product, practice etc has been used for a long time and is considered the usual type

sentences.english: a telephone conversation
sentences.chinese: 电话交谈

sentences.english: Children quickly get bored by adult conversation.
sentences.chinese: 儿童对成年人的谈话很快就会厌倦。

sentences.chinese: 他们用德语说了一会儿，好像对什么事有分歧。

sentences.chinese: 在这么喧闹的环境中进行谈话是不可能的。

sentences.english: ‘Did you have a good journey?’ he said, trying to make conversation .
sentences.chinese: “你旅途愉快吗？”他问道，试图找话谈。

sentences.english: He was silent, no matter how hard Sofia tried to engage him in conversation .
sentences.chinese: 无论索菲娅怎么引他说话，他就是一声不吭。

sentences.english: After a while, the conversation turned to a friend’s coming wedding.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，话题就转到一个朋友即将举行的婚礼上去了。

sentences.english: They were deep in conversation , relaxed and smiling.
sentences.chinese: 他们谈得很投入，很放松，脸上带着微笑。

sentences.english: He could hear snatches of conversation from across the room.
sentences.chinese: 他从房间对面听得到零星的对话。

detailed_translations.english: an informal talk in which people exchange news, feelings, and thoughts

name: convey
trans: v. 表达，传递（思想，感情等）

sentences.english: All this information can be conveyed in a simple diagram.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些信息可以通过一张简单的图表来表示。

sentences.english: Ads convey the message that thin is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 广告传递的信息是: 瘦就是美。

sentences.english: He was sent to convey a message to the UN Secretary General.
sentences.chinese: 他被派去向联合国秘书长传达一条信息。

detailed_translations.english: to communicate or express something, with or without using words

sentences.english: Although I soon convinced him of my innocence, I think he still has serious doubts about my sanity.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我很快就使他相信我是清白的，但是他还是非常怀疑我精神是否正常。

detailed_translations.english: If someone or something convinces you of something, they make you believe that it is true or that it exists

name: cook
trans: n.炊事员,厨师 v.烹调,做饭

sentences.english: Where did you learn to cook?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪里学烹调的？

sentences.english: Cook the sauce over a low heat for ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把这调味汁用低火烧十分钟。

sentences.english: slices of cooked ham
sentences.chinese: 熟的火腿片

sentences.english: a cooked breakfast
sentences.chinese: 做好的早餐

detailed_translations.english: to prepare food for eating by using heat
to prepare food for eating by using heat

name: cooker
trans: n. 炊具(锅、炉灶、烤炉等)

sentences.english: a gas cooker
sentences.chinese: 煤气炉灶

detailed_translations.chinese: 炊具；烹饪用水果；窜改者

sentences.english: a glass of milk and a cookie
sentences.chinese: 一杯牛奶和一块小甜饼

sentences.english: a chocolate chip cookie
sentences.chinese: 带巧克力碎粒的小甜饼

detailed_translations.english: a small flat sweet cake

sentences.english: She swam out into the cool water.
sentences.chinese: 她往外游向清凉的水里。

sentences.english: The evening air was cool.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚的空气很凉爽。

sentences.english: Relax in the sun with a cool drink.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光下喝杯清凉饮料放松一下。

sentences.english: the cooler weather of September
sentences.chinese: 九月较凉爽的天气

detailed_translations.english: low in temperature, but not cold, often in a way that feels pleasant
to make something slightly colder, or to become slightly colder
a temperature that is pleasantly cold
used to tell someone to stop being angry, violent etc

name: copy
trans: n. 抄本，副本；一本（份，册……） v. 抄写；复印；（计算机用语）拷（备 份盘）

sentences.english: back-up copies of your files
sentences.chinese: 你的文档的备份

sentences.english: Could you copy this letter and send it out, please?
sentences.chinese: 你能把这封信复印一份发出去吗？

detailed_translations.english: something that is made to be exactly like another thing
to deliberately make or produce something that is exactly like another thing

sentences.chinese: 你的嘴唇就像是波斯王国的弯弓，那是一张涂上朱砂的弯弓，那是一张头上镶嵌珊瑚的弯弓。

sentences.english: I believe they are doing a good job with that. How about the coral? Is it really as beautiful as they say?
sentences.chinese: 我相信他们是在做好事。对了，珊瑚怎么样？它们真的就像人们说的那么漂亮吗？
