sentences.english: We happened to discover we had a friend in common.
sentences.chinese: 我们碰巧发现我们有个共同的朋友。

detailed_translations.english: when something happens, there is an event, especially one that is not planned

sentences.english: Michelle smiled happily.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔高兴地笑了。

sentences.english: I’m a happily married man.
sentences.chinese: 我是个快乐的已婚男人。

sentences.english: So she married the prince, and they lived happily ever after (= used at the end of children’s stories to say that someone was happy for the rest of their life ).
sentences.chinese: 她嫁给了王子，他们从此过着幸福的生活。

detailed_translations.chinese: 快乐地；幸福地；幸运地；恰当地
detailed_translations.english: in a happy way

sentences.english: Juliet’s eyes shone with happiness.
sentences.chinese: 朱丽叶的双眼闪耀着幸福的光芒。

sentences.english: We want our children to have the best possible chance of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望自己的孩子得到追求幸福的最佳机会。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being happy

sentences.english: It’s a lovely house and we’ve been very happy here.
sentences.chinese: 房子很漂亮，我们住在这里非常开心。

sentences.english: I’ve never felt happier in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我一生从未感到如此快乐。

sentences.english: He was a happy child who rarely cried.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个快乐的孩子，很少哭鼻子。

sentences.english: the happy faces of the children
sentences.chinese: 孩子们快乐的表情

sentences.english: This has been the happiest day of my life.
sentences.chinese: 这是我一生中最快乐的一天。

detailed_translations.english: having feelings of pleasure, for example because something good has happened to you or you are very satisfied with your life

sentences.english: I think he’s harbouring some sort of grudge against me.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得他对我有点怀恨在心。

sentences.english: Sinks and draining boards can harbour germs.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽和沥水板可能藏有病菌。

sentences.english: Accusations of harbouring suspects were raised against the former Hungarian leadership.
sentences.chinese: 匈牙利前领导人被指控窝藏疑犯。

detailed_translations.chinese: 怀着（不好的想法、恐惧或希望）；包含，藏有；窝藏
detailed_translations.english: to keep bad thoughts, fears, or hopes in your mind for a long time

sentences.english: All the battleships can refresh in this harbor.
sentences.chinese: 所有战舰都能在这个港口装上补充供应品。

sentences.english: It is the harbor of Athens.
sentences.chinese: 它是雅典的港口城。

sentences.english: She stands on a small island in New York harbor, near the great city.
sentences.chinese: 她竖立在纽约海港的一座小岛，并紧挨着纽约这座大城市。

name: hard
trans: ad. 努力地；使劲；猛烈地 a.硬的；困难的；艰难的

sentences.english: a hard wooden chair
sentences.chinese: 一把硬木椅

sentences.english: the hardest substance known to man
sentences.chinese: 已知的最硬物质

sentences.english: After months without rain, the ground was too hard to plough.
sentences.chinese: 数月无雨，土地坚硬难犁。

sentences.english: This year’s exam was much harder than last year’s.
sentences.chinese: 今年的考试比去年的难得多。

detailed_translations.english: firm, stiff, and difficult to press down, break, or cut

sentences.english: My parents divorced when I was six, and I hardly knew my father.
sentences.chinese: 我六岁时父母离婚，我对父亲几乎一无所知。

sentences.english: The children were so excited they could hardly speak.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们兴奋得几乎连话都说不出来了。

sentences.english: I can hardly believe it.
sentences.chinese: 这简直让我难以置信。

sentences.english: (= almost no one ) writes to me these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今几乎没有人给我写信了。

sentences.english: Dad ate hardly anything (= almost nothing ).
sentences.chinese: 爸爸几乎没吃什么东西。

sentences.english: There was hardly any (= very little ) traffic.
sentences.chinese: 路上车少人稀。

sentences.english: She lives in Spain, so we hardly ever (= almost never ) see her.
sentences.chinese: 她住在西班牙，所以我们几乎见不到她。

detailed_translations.english: almost not

sentences.english: an economic policy that caused great hardship for many people
sentences.chinese: 造成许多人贫困的经济政策

sentences.english: Many students are suffering severe financial hardship.
sentences.chinese: 许多学生经济非常困难。

detailed_translations.english: something that makes your life difficult or unpleasant, especially a lack of money, or the condition of having a difficult life

sentences.english: He was hardworking and energetic.
sentences.chinese: 他很努力且精力充沛。

detailed_translations.chinese: 努力工作的；不辞辛劳的，苦干的
detailed_translations.english: If you describe someone as hardworking, you mean that they work very hard

sentences.english: The scandal did his career a lot of harm.
sentences.chinese: 丑闻对他的职业生涯造成很大损害。

sentences.english: Our children deserve protection from harm.
sentences.chinese: 我们的儿童理应得到保护免受伤害。

sentences.english: chemicals that harm the environment
sentences.chinese: 损害环境的化学品

detailed_translations.english: damage, injury, or trouble caused by someone’s actions or by an event
to have a bad effect on something

sentences.english: the harmful effects of smoking
sentences.chinese: 吸烟的害处

detailed_translations.english: causing harm

sentences.english: Her brother’s a bit simple, but he’s quite harmless.
sentences.chinese: 她的弟弟有点愚钝，不过他决不会伤害别人。

detailed_translations.english: unable or unlikely to hurt anyone or cause damage

sentences.english: the gorgeous vocal harmonies on ‘Mexicali Rose’
sentences.chinese: 《墨西哥玫瑰》的精彩和声演唱

sentences.english: three-part harmonies
sentences.chinese: 三部和声

detailed_translations.english: notes of music combined together in a pleasant way

sentences.english: every year at harvest time
sentences.chinese: 每年在收获的季节

sentences.english: Plum growers are expecting a bumper harvest this year.
sentences.chinese: 种植李树的农民期盼着今年有个好收成。

detailed_translations.english: the time when crops are gathered from the fields, or the act of gathering them
to gather crops from the fields

name: hat
trans: n.帽子(一般指有边的)；礼帽

sentences.english: Maria was wearing a beautiful new hat.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚戴着一顶漂亮的新帽子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that you wear on your head

sentences.english: The problems do not end if crocodiles successfully hatch from the eggs.
sentences.chinese: 即使鳄鱼成功地从卵中孵化出来，这些问题也不会终止。

detailed_translations.english: a hole in a ship or aircraft, usually used for loading goods, or the door that covers it
if an egg hatches, or if it is hatched, it breaks, letting the young bird, insect etc come out

sentences.english: It’s the kind of movie you either love or hate.
sentences.chinese: 这是那种你要么喜欢要么讨厌的电影。

sentences.english: He hates his job.
sentences.chinese: 他讨厌自己的工作。

detailed_translations.english: to dislike something very much

name: have has had had
trans: vt.有；吃；喝；进行；经受【一般现在 第三人称单数 过去式 过去分词】

sentences.english: Oil thieves sometimes hawk stolen gasoline on the side of highways.
sentences.chinese: 石油大盗们有时在公路边上兜售偷来的石油。

detailed_translations.english: a large bird that hunts and eats small birds and animals
to try to sell goods, usually by going from place to place and trying to persuade people to buy them

sentences.english: bales of hay.
sentences.chinese: 中文例句: 一捆捆的干草。

detailed_translations.english: long grass that has been cut and dried, used as food for cattle

sentences.english: ‘Where’s Paul?’ ‘He’s gone to the cinema.’
sentences.chinese: “保罗在哪儿？”“他去看电影了。”

sentences.english: It was he who first suggested the idea.
sentences.chinese: 是他先提出这个想法的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

name: head
trans: n. 头；头脑(像)；才智；首脑；源头；标题 a. 头部的；主要的；首席的 v. 率领；加标题；用头顶；出发；(船等)驶向

sentences.english: He kissed the top of her head.
sentences.chinese: 他吻了一下她的头顶。

sentences.english: Alan fell asleep as soon as he put his head on the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦头一挨枕头就睡着了。

sentences.english: They dived head first into the water.
sentences.chinese: 他们一头跳进水中。

sentences.english: She was dressed in black from head to foot (= over all her body ).
sentences.chinese: 她从头到脚穿了一身黑。

sentences.english: He still has a full head of hair (= has all his hair, even though he is getting rather old ).
sentences.chinese: 他依然满头浓发。

sentences.english: Jenny marched proudly at the head of the procession.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮自豪地走在游行队伍的前列。

sentences.english: David was asked to head up the technical team.
sentences.chinese: 戴维被要求领导技术小组。

detailed_translations.english: the top part of your body that has your face at the front and is supported by your neck
to be in charge of a team, government, organization etc

sentences.english: If you have a headache, you should take some aspirin.
sentences.chinese: 要是头痛，你该吃点阿司匹林。

sentences.english: The airline's biggest headache is the increase in the price of aviation fuel.
sentences.chinese: 令航空公司最头疼的问题是航空燃料价格的上涨。

detailed_translations.english: a pain in your head

sentences.english: a paper carrying the front-page headline: ‘Space Aliens meet with President’
sentences.chinese: 头版报道题为“天外来客会见总统”的报纸

detailed_translations.chinese: 大标题；内容提要；栏外标题；头版头条新闻
detailed_translations.english: the title of a newspaper report, which is printed in large letters above the report

detailed_translations.chinese: 给…加标题；使成为注意中心；大力宣传
detailed_translations.english: to give a headline to an article or story

sentences.english: This headmaster is very modest.
sentences.chinese: 这位校长很谦虚。

sentences.english: Our headmaster rattled on for at least two hours at the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 我们的校长在开学典礼上唠唠叨叨地讲了至少两个小时。

sentences.english: Before the door of the headmaster's office,she stopped and re-collected herself for a while.
sentences.chinese: 在校长办公室门前，她停步片刻使自己镇静下来。

detailed_translations.english: a male teacher who is in charge of a school

sentences.english: "We've got life-size cutouts of William and Kate, " boasts one headmistress, claiming: "The children are really excited."
sentences.chinese: “我们制作了真人大小的威廉和凯特的人像，”一名女校长沾沾自喜地炫耀着：“孩子们可兴奋了。”

sentences.english: When I was growing up in the colony of Hong Kong, my British headmistress would glare when we asked to learn Chinese, and hiss: “If you want to learn Chinese, go onto the streets!”
sentences.chinese: 我成长在当时还是英国殖民地的香港，我的英籍女校长对我们要求学习中文的请求不屑一顾，并嘶声说道：“如果你想学习中文，就到街上去！”

sentences.english: In 1987 the school headmistress referred the case to the Institute of Child Health at University College London.
sentences.chinese: 1987年，学校校长将这些儿童的案例提交至伦敦大学学院儿童健康研究所。

detailed_translations.english: a female teacher who is in charge of a school

sentences.english: I know a number of parents have rung the headteacher about what has happened but I would appeal for everyone to be calm, particularly in relation to those people involved.
sentences.chinese: 我知道一些家长正围着校长问事情发生的经过，但我呼吁大家要保持冷静，特别是在那些跟这件事有直接关系的人。

sentences.english: I’m worried about my husband’s health.
sentences.chinese: 我担心我丈夫的健康状况。

sentences.english: Even if you haven’t got much money, at least you’ve got your health.
sentences.chinese: 即使你没有太多钱，但起码你拥有健康。

detailed_translations.english: the general condition of your body and how healthy you are

sentences.english: a healthy baby boy
sentences.chinese: 健康的男婴

sentences.english: I’ve always been perfectly healthy until now.
sentences.chinese: 直到现在，我的身体一直非常健康。

sentences.english: a healthy lifestyle
sentences.chinese: 健康的生活方式

detailed_translations.english: physically strong and not likely to become ill or weak

name: heap
trans: n. 堆 v. 堆起来

sentences.english: a rubbish heap
sentences.chinese: 垃圾堆

sentences.english: We piled the branches into heaps for burning.
sentences.chinese: 我们把树枝堆起来烧。

detailed_translations.english: a large untidy pile of things
to put a lot of things on top of each other in an untidy way

name: hear heard heard
trans: v. 听见；听说,得知【一般现在 过去式 过去分词】

sentences.english: a child with a hearing disability
sentences.chinese: 有听力障碍的儿童

detailed_translations.english: the sense which you use to hear sounds

name: heart
trans: n.心.心脏, 纸牌中的红桃

sentences.english: Regular exercise is good for the heart.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼对心脏有好处。

sentences.english: Can you hear my heart beating?
sentences.chinese: 你能听见我的心跳吗？

sentences.english: Her cheeks were hot and her heart was pounding.
sentences.chinese: 她脸颊发烫，心怦怦直跳。

sentences.english: My heart raced. Were we going to land safely?
sentences.chinese: 我心跳得厉害。我们能安全着陆吗？

sentences.english: Daniel had no history of heart problems.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼尔没有心脏病史。

sentences.english: She suffers from a rare heart condition.
sentences.chinese: 她患有罕见的心脏病。

sentences.english: His breathing and heart rate were now normal.
sentences.chinese: 他的呼吸和心率现在都正常了。

detailed_translations.english: the organ in your chest which pumps blood through your body

name: heat
trans: n. 热 vt. 把……加热

sentences.english: Ice needs heat to melt.
sentences.chinese: 冰需要热才能融化。

sentences.english: Insulating the attic is a good way to reduce heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 为阁楼安装隔热层是减少热量流失的好方法。

sentences.english: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.chinese: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.english: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.chinese: 把牛奶煮开。

detailed_translations.english: warmth or the quality of being hot
to make something become warm or hot

sentences.english: He believed that he and his wife would one day be together again in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 他相信他和妻子有一天会在天国重聚。

sentences.english: He looked up towards the heavens.
sentences.chinese: 他仰望苍穹。

detailed_translations.english: the place where God is believed to live and where good people are believed to go when they die

sentences.english: The wardrobe was too heavy for me to move on my own.
sentences.chinese: 衣橱太重，我一个人移不动。

sentences.english: a heavy suitcase
sentences.chinese: 沉重的手提箱

sentences.english: The males are seven times heavier than the females.
sentences.chinese: 雄性的重量是雌性的七倍。

sentences.english: Heavy rain has caused flooding in many areas.
sentences.chinese: 大雨在很多地区造成水灾。

sentences.english: The apple trees were heavy with fruit.
sentences.chinese: 苹果树上果实累累。

detailed_translations.english: weighing a lot

sentences.english: I became heavily involved in politics.
sentences.chinese: 我深陷政治之中。

sentences.english: The report was heavily criticized in the press.
sentences.chinese: 该报道遭到了新闻界的严厉批评。

sentences.english: a heavily populated area
sentences.chinese: 人口密集地区

sentences.english: thousands of heavily armed troops
sentences.chinese: 全副武装的数千人的部队

sentences.english: His wife was heavily pregnant at the time.
sentences.chinese: 那时他妻子已经待产。

detailed_translations.english: in large amounts, to a high degree, or with great severity

sentences.english: black boots with high heels
sentences.chinese: 有高跟的黑靴子

detailed_translations.english: the curved back part of your foot
(of a vessel) to lean over; list

sentences.english: Sam’s about the same height as his sister now.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆现在身高和他姐姐差不多了。

sentences.english: State your age, height, and weight.
sentences.chinese: 说出你的年龄、身高和体重。

sentences.english: Rachel had always been scared of heights.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔过去一直恐高。

detailed_translations.english: how tall someone or something is

sentences.english: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.english: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.english: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 他们被援救的直升机从大火中解救了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly

name: hello
trans: int. 喂；你好（表示打招呼，问候或唤起注意）

sentences.english: Hello, John! How are you?
sentences.chinese: 喂，约翰！你好吗？

sentences.english: Stanley, come and say hello to your nephew.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦利，过来和你的侄子打声招呼。

sentences.english: Well, hello there ! I haven’t seen you for ages.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，你好！好久不见了。

detailed_translations.english: used as a greeting when you see or meet someone

detailed_translations.chinese: 表示问候， 惊奇或唤起注意时的用语

sentences.english: The Sword split the Knight's helmet and bit him fatally.
sentences.chinese: 剑劈开了骑士的头盔并致命地刺进他。

sentences.english: Instead, he was told the last time that she loved him, got a hug from her, put his helmet on her so that she can live, and die himself...
sentences.chinese: 相反，他叫女孩最后一次说她爱他，最后一次拥抱他，并让她戴上自己的头盔，因而，女孩可以幸免于难，而他自己却离开了人世……

sentences.english: Without Christ we are defenseless against the Devil, but with "the helmet of salvation" our minds are protected by God.
sentences.chinese: 没有基督，我们无力防御魔鬼的攻击；但有救恩的头盔，我们的心思便有神的保护。

detailed_translations.english: a strong hard hat that soldiers,  motorcycle  riders, the police etc wear to protect their heads

sentences.english: If there’s anything I can do to help, just give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要我帮忙，就给我打个电话。

sentences.english: Thank you for all your help.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你的一切帮助。

detailed_translations.english: to make it possible or easier for someone to do something by doing part of their work or by giving them something they need
things you do to make it easier or possible for someone to do something

sentences.english: Thank you for your advice; it’s been very helpful.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的建议，它非常有用。

sentences.english: It is helpful if we address a few key questions here.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们在这里解决一些关键问题会很有用的。

detailed_translations.english: providing useful help in making a situation better or easier

sentences.english: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡聚集在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.english: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡集聚在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.english: The hen sits in the hencoop [henroost].
sentences.chinese: 母鸡卧窝。

detailed_translations.english: an adult female chicken

sentences.english: Jane? I don’t really know her.
sentences.chinese: 简？我不太认识她。

sentences.english: Margaret wants me to go with her.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特想让我和她一起去。

sentences.english: Give her the keys.
sentences.chinese: 把钥匙给她。

sentences.english: Her room was pleasant and airy.
sentences.chinese: 她的房间既舒适又通风。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
belonging to or connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned

sentences.english: Sprinkle the dish with chopped fresh herbs.
sentences.chinese: 在菜肴上撒些切碎的新鲜香草。

detailed_translations.english: a small plant that is used to improve the taste of food, or to make medicine

name: here
trans: ad. 这里，在这里；向这里

sentences.english: What are you doing here?
sentences.chinese: 你们在这里干什么？

sentences.english: Shall we eat here?
sentences.chinese: 我们在这里吃好吗？

sentences.english: Come here for a minute.
sentences.chinese: 到这里来一下。

sentences.english: This switch here controls the lights.
sentences.chinese: 此处的这个开关控制电灯。

sentences.english: My friend here will show you the way.
sentences.chinese: 我这位朋友会给你指路的。

sentences.english: Come on. I’m over here .
sentences.chinese: 快点，我在这里。

sentences.english: Will you be back here tonight?
sentences.chinese: 今晚你回这里吗？

sentences.english: There are no good pubs round here .
sentences.chinese: 这一带没有好的酒吧。

sentences.english: Let’s settle the matter here and now .
sentences.chinese: 我们现在就解决此事吧。

detailed_translations.english: used after a verb or preposition to mean ‘in, at or to this position or place ’

sentences.english: He had dared to speak out against injustice, and overnight he became a national hero .
sentences.chinese: 他敢于站出来抨击不公正的现象，一夜之间就成了国家英雄。

sentences.english: His father was a war hero , a former fighter pilot.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲是一位战争英雄，曾经是战斗机飞行员。

sentences.english: the unsung heroes who drove convoys of aid to Bosnia
sentences.chinese: 运载援助物品到波斯尼亚的那些无名英雄

sentences.english: A man hailed as a hero for 50 years has been unmasked as a traitor.
sentences.chinese: 50年来一直被誉为英雄的人被揭发为叛徒。

sentences.english: The hero of Doctor Zhivago dies in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 《日瓦戈医生》的男主人公于1929年去世。

detailed_translations.english: a man who is admired for doing something extremely brave

sentences.english: a heroine of the French Resistance
sentences.chinese: 法国抵抗运动的一位女英雄

sentences.english: The heroine is a senior TV executive.
sentences.chinese: 女主人公是一位电视台高级主管。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who is admired for doing something extremely brave

sentences.english: He bent and touched his mouth to hers.
sentences.chinese: 他俯身吻她的嘴唇。

sentences.english: These are my gloves. Hers are in the drawer.
sentences.chinese: 这是我的手套，她的在抽屉里。

sentences.english: The idea was hers.
sentences.chinese: 这个主意是她出的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned

sentences.english: She hurt herself.
sentences.chinese: 她弄伤了自己。

sentences.english: She must be very proud of herself.
sentences.chinese: 她一定非常自豪。

detailed_translations.english: used when the woman or girl who performs an action is also affected by it

sentences.english: Hey, wait a minute!
sentences.chinese: 喂，等一下！

detailed_translations.chinese: 喂！（引起注意等）；你好！（表示问候）
detailed_translations.english: a shout used to get someone’s attention or to show surprise, interest, or annoyance

name: hi
trans: int. 你好（表示打招呼、问候或唤起注 意）

sentences.english: Hi! How are you?
sentences.chinese: 嗨！你好吗？

sentences.english: Hi there! I haven’t seen you for ages.
sentences.chinese: 嘿！好久不见。

detailed_translations.chinese: 嗨！（表示问候或用以唤起注意）
detailed_translations.english: hello

sentences.english: Dormice hibernate from October to May.
sentences.chinese: 睡鼠从10月到5月冬眠。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过冬；（动物）冬眠；（人等）避寒
detailed_translations.english: if an animal hibernates, it sleeps for the whole winter

sentences.english: "In fact, " she said after a while, "We have gone into hibernation.
sentences.chinese: “实际上，”过了一会儿，她说道，“我们已经被困在这里过冬了。

sentences.english: After all, he reasoned, some single-celled creatures are known to enter a hibernation-like state and survive for years with no air or food.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，他推断，众所周知一些单细胞生物可以进入一种类似冬眠的状态，并在没有空气和水的状态下生存数年。

sentences.english: Heart rate tracking for three of the Alaska bears showed a drop from 55 beats per minute on average before hibernation to 14 erratic ones per minute in winter.
sentences.chinese: 对三头阿拉斯加的黑熊的心率追踪显示出它们在冬眠前的平均每分钟 55 下降低到了冬天里每分钟飘忽不定的 14 下。

name: hide hid hidden
trans: v. 把…藏起来，隐藏【一般现在 过去式 过去分词】

name: high
trans: a. 高的;高度的 ad. 高地

sentences.english: This is the highest mountain in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 这是日本最高的山。

sentences.english: The camp was surrounded by a high fence.
sentences.chinese: 营地四周围着高高的栅栏。

sentences.english: a ten-foot high statue
sentences.chinese: 10英尺高的雕像

sentences.english: How high is the Eiffel Tower?
sentences.chinese: 埃菲尔铁塔有多高？

sentences.english: He kicked the ball high into the air, over the heads of the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他把球高高地踢向空中，越过了人群。

detailed_translations.english: measuring a long distance from the bottom to the top
at or to a level high above the ground, the floor etc

sentences.english: Interstate Highway 75
sentences.chinese: 75号州际公路

detailed_translations.english: a wide main road that joins one town to another

name: hill
trans: n. 小山;丘陵;土堆;斜坡

sentences.english: Their house is on a hill overlooking the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子建在可以俯视大海的小山上。

sentences.english: A cart was making its way up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车正在爬上山丘。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is higher than the land around it, like a mountain but smaller

sentences.english: The airplane crashed on a hillside.
sentences.chinese: 飞机在山坡上坠毁。

sentences.english: They are quarrying the hillside for marble.
sentences.chinese: 他们正从山坡上采大理石。

sentences.english: They sat and had their lunch on a grassy hillside.
sentences.chinese: 他们坐在长满草的山坡上吃午饭。

detailed_translations.english: the sloping side of a hill

name: hilly
trans: a. 丘陵的； 多小山的

sentences.english: The areas where the fighting is taking place are hilly and densely wooded.
sentences.chinese: 战斗发生的地区丘陵起伏，树木茂密。

detailed_translations.chinese: 丘陵的；陡的；多小山的；多坡的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of hills

sentences.english: Are you in love with him?
sentences.chinese: 你爱上他了吗？

sentences.english: Why don’t you ask him yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不自己问他？

sentences.english: He repeated what she had told him.
sentences.chinese: 他把她告诉他的话重复了一遍。

sentences.english: I knew it was him as soon as I heard his voice.
sentences.chinese: 我一听声音就知道是他。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a man, boy, or male animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: He repossessed himself of his farm.
sentences.chinese: 他收回自己所有的农场。

sentences.english: He barred himself in.
sentences.chinese: 他把自己关在里面。

sentences.english: He stroked the name of himself with his pen.
sentences.chinese: 他用钢笔划掉了他自己的名字。

sentences.english: The best way to explore the island is to hire a car.
sentences.chinese: 在该岛寻幽访胜的最好方式就是租用一辆汽车。

sentences.english: What does it cost to hire a boat for a week?
sentences.chinese: 一艘小船租用一星期的费用是多少？

sentences.english: a car hire company
sentences.chinese: 汽车租赁公司

detailed_translations.english: to pay money to borrow something for a short period of time
an arrangement in which you pay a sum of money to borrow something for a short time

sentences.english: He took my hand in his.
sentences.chinese: 他握住我的手。

detailed_translations.english: of or belonging to him

sentences.english: Throughout history the achievements of women have been largely ignored.
sentences.chinese: 从古至今，妇女的成就都被大大地忽视了。

sentences.english: No man in recent history has done more to rebuild the Democratic Party.
sentences.chinese: 他对重建民主党的贡献在近代史上无人能及。

sentences.english: the early history of Scotland
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰的早期历史

sentences.english: Other meteor storms have occurred in recorded history .
sentences.chinese: 在有记载的历史上发生过其他的流星暴。

sentences.english: a museum devoted to local history
sentences.chinese: 专门介绍当地历史的博物馆

sentences.english: one of the darkest episodes in American history
sentences.chinese: 美国历史上最黑暗的事件之一

sentences.english: an interesting period in Egyptian history
sentences.chinese: 埃及历史上一段有趣的时期

sentences.english: a decision that changed the course of history
sentences.chinese: 改变历史进程的决定

sentences.english: a college steeped in history
sentences.chinese: 一所历史悠久的学院

sentences.english: Your doctor will ask for your medical history.
sentences.chinese: 医生会询问你的病历。

detailed_translations.english: all the things that happened in the past, especially the political, social, or economic development of a nation

name: hit hit hit
trans: n.& vt. 打,撞,击中【一般现在 过去式 过去分词】

sentences.english: The most important member of any hive is the queen bee.
sentences.chinese: 任何一个蜂房中最重要的成员都是蜂王。

sentences.english: What people must remember is that one hive quickly become two, two become four and four become eight.
sentences.chinese: 人们一定要记住的是，一个蜂巢很快会变成两个，两个变成四个，四个变成八个。

detailed_translations.english: a small box where  bees  are kept, or the bees that live in this box

sentences.english: What are your hobbies?
sentences.chinese: 你有些什么爱好？

sentences.english: Susan’s hobbies include reading, cooking, and drama.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊的业余爱好包括阅读、烹饪和戏剧。

sentences.english: Retirement gave him the time to pursue his hobbies.
sentences.chinese: 退休以后他有充裕的时间来做自己喜欢做的事。

detailed_translations.english: an activity that you enjoy doing in your free time

sentences.english: I began digging a hole for the plant.
sentences.chinese: 我开始挖洞种那棵植物。

detailed_translations.english: an empty space in something solid
to hit the ball into a hole in golf

sentences.english: The school holidays start tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 学校假期从明天开始。

sentences.english: a national holiday
sentences.chinese: 全国假日

detailed_translations.english: a time of rest from work, school etc

sentences.english: the holy city of Varanasi
sentences.chinese: 圣城瓦拉纳西

detailed_translations.english: connected with God and religion

name: home
trans: n. 家 ad. 到家；回家

sentences.english: They have a beautiful home in California.
sentences.chinese: 他们在加州有个美丽的家。

sentences.english: Good luck in your new home!
sentences.chinese: 祝你在新家一切顺利！

sentences.english: A family of birds made their home (= started living ) under the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝鸟在屋顶下安了家。

sentences.english: These children need a proper home life.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要正常的家庭生活。

detailed_translations.english: the house, apartment, or place where you live
relating to or belonging to your home or family

sentences.english: Many are planning to return to their homeland.
sentences.chinese: 很多人正计划回到自己的祖国去。

detailed_translations.english: the country where someone was born

sentences.english: Do you like your hometown?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢你的家乡吗？

sentences.english: She expressed the wish to be interred in the graveyard of hometown.
sentences.chinese: 她表达了死后葬在故乡的墓地上的愿望。

detailed_translations.english: Someone's hometown is the town where they live or the town that they come from

sentences.english: For homework, finish the exercise on page 14.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是完成第14页的练习。

detailed_translations.english: work that a student at school is asked to do at home

sentences.english: He was a hard-working, honest man.
sentences.chinese: 他勤奋老实。

sentences.english: Ann had an honest face.
sentences.chinese: 安有一张诚实的面孔。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is honest always tells the truth and does not cheat or steal

sentences.english: Hi, honey.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，亲爱的。

detailed_translations.english: a sweet sticky substance produced by  bees  , used as food

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…说甜言蜜语；加蜜使甜

sentences.english: They cruised to Hong Kong on their vacation.
sentences.chinese: 他们在假期里到香港去游览。

name: honour
trans: n. 荣誉，光荣 vt. 尊敬，给予荣誉【英】

sentences.english: He was showered with honours – among them an Oscar.
sentences.chinese: 他获得了很多荣誉–其中包括奥斯卡奖。

detailed_translations.english: the respect that you, your family, your country etc receive from other people, which makes you feel proud

detailed_translations.chinese: 尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据
detailed_translations.english: to treat someone with special respect

name: honor
trans: n. 荣誉，光荣 vt. 尊敬，给予荣誉【美】

sentences.english: For the French team, winning tomorrow’s game is a matter of national honor.
sentences.chinese: 对法国队来说，打赢明天的比赛事关国家荣誉。

detailed_translations.english: the respect that you, your family, your country etc receive from other people, which makes you feel proud

name: hook
trans: n.& v. 钩子；衔接，连接

sentences.english: We hooked the trailer to the back of the car.
sentences.chinese: 我们把拖车挂在汽车尾部。

sentences.english: a dress that hooks at the back
sentences.chinese: 从后背用钩扣的连衣裙

detailed_translations.english: to fasten or hang sth on sth else using a hook; to be fastened or hanging in this way

sentences.english: If that worked, hooray! If not, soldier on to the next step.
sentences.chinese: 如果这样行得通，万岁！如果还不行，那就迎着困难进行下一步吧

sentences.english: Some people have referred to documentaries like Blue Planet and Planet Earth as 'wildlife porn' – and I'd say hooray to that if it inspires viewers to get out into the natural world.
sentences.chinese: 有些人把《蓝色星球》和《行星地球》这样的纪录片称之为‘野生生命情色片’——如果它们能激发观众亲近自然，那我会为这样的情色高呼万岁。

sentences.english: I do hope everything goes well.
sentences.chinese: 我真心希望一切顺利。

sentences.english: It was hoped that the job would be filled by a local person.
sentences.chinese: 希望该职位由当地人来担任。

sentences.english: Let’s just hope someone finds her bag.
sentences.chinese: 希望有人找到她的提包。

sentences.english: I hope to God I haven’t left the car window open.
sentences.chinese: 但愿我没有忘记关车窗。

sentences.english: When I first arrived in New York, I was full of hope for the future.
sentences.chinese: 我初到纽约时，对未来充满希望。

detailed_translations.english: to want something to happen or be true and to believe that it is possible or likely
a feeling of wanting something to happen or be true and believing that it is possible or likely

name: hopeful
trans: a. 有希望的；有前途的

sentences.english: Things might get better, but it doesn’t look very hopeful right now.
sentences.chinese: 情况也许会好转，但目前看来希望不大。

detailed_translations.english: making you believe that sth you want will happen; bringing hope

sentences.english: We tried to stop the flames from spreading, but we knew it was hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 我们试图阻止火势蔓延，但我们知道这是不可能的。

sentences.english: Getting your work published often seems a hopeless task.
sentences.chinese: 想让自己的作品出版似乎总是徒劳的。

sentences.english: I kept on struggling forward, even though I knew it was hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 虽然知道无望，我还是奋力挣扎向前。

sentences.english: I began to feel lonely and hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 我开始感到寂寞绝望。

detailed_translations.english: if something that you try to do is hopeless, there is no possibility of it being successful

sentences.english: The weather has been really horrible all week.
sentences.chinese: 整个星期天气都很糟。

sentences.english: a horrible smell
sentences.chinese: 极难闻的气味

sentences.english: The food looked horrible, but it tasted OK.
sentences.chinese: 那食物看上去很糟，可吃起来还不错。

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人恐惧的， 可怕的； 骇人听闻的； 极讨厌的， 使人不愉快的； 糟透的
detailed_translations.english: very bad - used, for example, about things you see, taste, or smell, or about the weather

sentences.english: a horse and cart
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车

sentences.english: Lee had never ridden a horse before.
sentences.chinese: 李以前从未骑过马。

detailed_translations.english: a large strong animal that people ride and use for pulling heavy things

sentences.english: They are building a new hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在建一家新医院。

detailed_translations.english: a large building where sick or injured people receive medical treatment

name: host
trans: n. 主人；节目主持人 v. 做主人招待

sentences.english: Which country is going to host the next World Cup?
sentences.chinese: 哪个国家将主办下一届世界杯？

detailed_translations.english: to provide the place and everything that is needed for an organized event

sentences.english: The hostess introduced them.
sentences.chinese: 女主人介绍了他们。

detailed_translations.chinese: 女主人，女老板；女服务员；舞女；女房东
detailed_translations.english: a woman at a party, meal etc who has invited all the guests and provides them with food, drink etc

sentences.english: a hot day in July
sentences.chinese: 7月炎热的一天

sentences.english: a hot curry
sentences.chinese: 一种辛辣的咖喱

detailed_translations.english: something that is hot has a high temperature - used about weather, places, food, drink, or objects

sentences.english: As they stroll down the beach, taking in all the newness of America, they see a very large billboard that reads: "HOT DOGS, " with a big arrow pointing down to a little hot dog stand.
sentences.chinese: 正当他们在海滩闲步，尽情享受美国的新奇的时候，他们看到了很大的广告牌，上面写着，“热狗”，还有个箭头指着一条站着的小狗！

sentences.english: At a ballgame, you have a hot dog.
sentences.chinese: 看一场球赛，你会吃一个热狗。

detailed_translations.chinese: 热狗（一种中间夹香肠的三明治）
detailed_translations.english: a cooked  sausage  in a long piece of bread

sentences.english: I’ve booked the flights and the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我已订好机票和酒店。

sentences.english: We’ll be staying at the Hotel Ibis.
sentences.chinese: 我们将住在宜必思酒店。

detailed_translations.english: a building where people pay to stay and eat meals

sentences.english: The interview will last about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 面试大概要持续两小时。

sentences.english: I study for an hour every night.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚学习一小时。

sentences.english: I’ll be back in three hours .
sentences.chinese: 我三小时以后回来。

sentences.english: Three hours later he was back.
sentences.chinese: 三小时后他回来了。

sentences.english: Her bag was stolen within hours of her arrival.
sentences.chinese: 她才到没几个小时，手提包就被偷了。

sentences.english: You weren’t interested in my story a half hour ago.
sentences.chinese: 半小时之前你还对我讲的事情不感兴趣呢。

sentences.english: It takes about a quarter of an hour to walk into town.
sentences.chinese: 步行进城大约需要一刻钟。

sentences.english: The hotel is only an hour’s drive from the airport.
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆离机场只有一小时的车程。

sentences.english: a top speed of 120 miles an hour
sentences.chinese: 120英里的最高时速

sentences.english: Please call during office hours.
sentences.chinese: 请在办公时间来电。

sentences.english: There was a knock on the door in the early hours of the morning.
sentences.chinese: 凌晨时分有人敲门。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring time. There are 60 minutes in one hour, and 24 hours in one day.

sentences.english: a four-bedroom house
sentences.chinese: 一幢有四间卧室的房子

sentences.english: America’s oldest publishing house
sentences.chinese: 美国历史最悠久的出版社

sentences.english: a small independent software house
sentences.chinese: 一家小型的独立软件公司

sentences.english: an auction house
sentences.chinese: 一家拍卖行

sentences.english: a famous Italian fashion house
sentences.chinese: 一家著名的意大利时装公司

detailed_translations.english: a building that someone lives in, especially one that has more than one level and is intended to be used by one family

sentences.english: Married at nineteen, she was a traditional housewife and mother of four children.
sentences.chinese: 她19岁就结婚了，是个传统的家庭主妇和4个孩子的母亲。

detailed_translations.english: a married woman who works at home doing the cooking, cleaning etc, but does not have a job outside the house

sentences.english: Men are doing more housework nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 现今男人正在承担越来越多的家务。

detailed_translations.english: work that you do to take care of a house, for example washing, cleaning etc

sentences.english: How do you spell your name?
sentences.chinese: 你的名字怎么拼写？

sentences.english: How can I help you?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么帮你？

sentences.english: I’d like to help in some way, but I’m not sure how.
sentences.chinese: 我想帮点忙，可不知道该怎么做。

sentences.english: He explained how the system worked.
sentences.chinese: 他讲解了该系统是如何运转的。

sentences.english: We both used to work at the airport – that’s how we met.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都曾经在机场工作过，我们就是这么认识的。

sentences.english: advice on how best (= the best way ) to invest your money
sentences.chinese: 如何以最好方式进行投资的建议

sentences.english: They had a number of suggestions as to how the service could be improved.
sentences.chinese: 他们有一些关于如何改进服务的建议。

sentences.english: This still leaves the question of how local services should be funded.
sentences.chinese: 这仍然没有解决如何为地方公共服务业提供资金的问题。

sentences.english: How many kids do they have now?
sentences.chinese: 他们现在有几个孩子？

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the way in which something happens or is done

name: however
trans: ad. 可是 conj. 然而，可是，尽管如此

sentences.english: This is a cheap and simple process. However, there are dangers.
sentences.chinese: 这是个花钱少而又简单的方法，不过有危险。

sentences.english: an extremely unpleasant disease that is, however, easy to treat
sentences.chinese: 一种让人极其难受却容易治疗的病

sentences.english: However you look at it, it's going to cost a lot.
sentences.chinese: 不管你怎么看，它都要花很多钱。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are adding a fact or piece of information that seems surprising, or seems very different from what you have just said

sentences.english: wind howling in the trees
sentences.chinese: 在林间呼啸的风

sentences.english: Somewhere a dog suddenly howled, baying at the moon.
sentences.chinese: 某个地方的一只狗突然嗥叫起来，对着月亮狂吠。

detailed_translations.english: if the wind howls, it makes a loud high sound as it blows
If an animal such as a wolf or a dog howls, it makes a long, loud, crying sound

detailed_translations.chinese: 嗥叫； 呼啸；吼叫； 哀号
detailed_translations.english: a loud high sound made by the wind blowing

sentences.english: We stood there crying and hugging each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们站在那里哭着互相拥抱。

sentences.english: She went to her daughter and hugged her tightly .
sentences.chinese: 她走到女儿身边，紧紧地拥抱她。

detailed_translations.english: to put your arms around someone and hold them tightly to show love or friendship
to put your arms around someone and hold them tightly to show love or friendship
the action of putting your arms around someone and holding them tightly to show love or friendship

sentences.english: a huge dog
sentences.chinese: 一条大狗

sentences.english: huge crowds
sentences.chinese: 大群大群的人

sentences.english: Your room’s huge compared to mine.
sentences.chinese: 你的房间跟我的比很大。

sentences.english: These shoes make my feet look huge.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋让我的脚看上去大极了。

sentences.english: the huge scale of the problem
sentences.chinese: 该问题的严重性

detailed_translations.english: extremely large in size, amount, or degree

sentences.english: There are many different cell types in the human body .
sentences.chinese: 人体中有许多种不同的细胞类型。

sentences.english: the power of the human mind
sentences.chinese: 人脑的威力

sentences.english: The desire for joy lies deep within the human spirit .
sentences.chinese: 对快乐的渴求藏在人类心灵深处。

sentences.english: Infra-red light is invisible to the human eye.
sentences.chinese: 红外线是人眼看不见的。

sentences.english: theories of human behaviour
sentences.chinese: 关于人类行为的理论

sentences.english: different areas of human experience
sentences.chinese: 人类各方面的经验

sentences.english: respect for the absolute value of human life
sentences.chinese: 对人类生命绝对价值的尊重

sentences.english: The accident was the result of human error.
sentences.chinese: 事故是由于人为过失造成的。

sentences.english: The meat was declared unfit for human consumption.
sentences.chinese: 这种肉被宣布不适合人类食用。

sentences.english: Like humans, cats and dogs are omnivores.
sentences.chinese: 和人类一样，猫和狗是杂食性动物。

detailed_translations.english: belonging to or relating to people, especially as opposed to machines or animals
a person

sentences.english: The treatment will be tried out on human beings only after it has been shown to be safe and foolproof in animals.
sentences.chinese: 该疗法只有在动物身上证明安全、万无一失后才会在人体上试用。

detailed_translations.english: A human being is a man, woman, or child

sentences.english: humorous stories
sentences.chinese: 诙谐的故事

sentences.english: The film has some mildly humorous moments.
sentences.chinese: 那部电影中有些略显幽默的片段。

detailed_translations.english: funny and enjoyable

sentences.english: his humour and charm
sentences.chinese: 他的幽默感和魅力

sentences.english: Greg’s feeble attempt at humour
sentences.chinese: 格雷格干巴巴的幽默

sentences.english: English humour
sentences.chinese: 英国式幽默

sentences.english: It’s vital to have a sense of humor in this job.
sentences.chinese: 做这份工作必须具备幽默感。

sentences.english: The host puts the contestants at ease with his own brand of humour .
sentences.chinese: 主持人以他别具一格的幽默让参赛者放松心情。

sentences.english: He showed flashes of humor that delighted the audience.
sentences.chinese: 他不时冒出些幽默话逗得观众忍俊不禁。

detailed_translations.english: the ability or tendency to think that things are funny, or funny things you say that show you have this ability
to do what someone wants or to pretend to agree with them so that they do not become upset

sentences.english: I like your sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢你的 幽默感。

sentences.english: His remarks participated of the sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 他的话里带有几分幽默感。

sentences.english: She loved everything about him -- his personality, his humor, the way he dressed.
sentences.chinese: 她爱他的一切——他的性格，他的幽默，还有他的衣着打扮。

sentences.english: The tree was probably a hundred years old.
sentences.chinese: 这棵树很可能已经有100年了。

sentences.english: They’ve had this argument a hundred times before.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题他们以前已经争论过无数次了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 100
a very large number of things or people

sentences.english: Try to satisfy your hunger by eating some fruit.
sentences.chinese: 吃些水果充充饥吧。

sentences.english: her hunger for knowledge
sentences.chinese: 她的求知欲

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you need to eat

sentences.english: I was cold, tired, and hungry.
sentences.chinese: 我又冷，又累，又饿。

sentences.english: If you get hungry, there’s some cold chicken in the fridge.
sentences.chinese: 你要是饿了，冰箱里有些冷鸡肉。

sentences.english: Do you still feel hungry?
sentences.chinese: 你还觉得饿吗？

sentences.english: She is hungry for success.
sentences.chinese: 她渴望成功。

detailed_translations.english: wanting to eat something

sentences.english: lion/rhino/stag etc hunt
sentences.chinese: 猎狮/犀牛/雄鹿等

sentences.english: the hunt for the missing child
sentences.chinese: 搜寻失踪儿童

sentences.english: Wolves tend to hunt in packs (= hunt in groups ) .
sentences.chinese: 狼往往成群捕猎。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when people chase animals in order to kill or catch them
to chase animals and birds in order to kill or catch them

sentences.english: The hunters stalked their prey.
sentences.chinese: 猎人们隐伏跟踪猎物。

detailed_translations.english: a person who hunts wild animals, or an animal that hunts other animals for food

sentences.english: I still remember a hurricane that hit us thirty years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得三十年前袭击我们的一次飓风。

sentences.english: Our love is not fierce, not hot, but despite the tsunami hurricane, also vowed.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱，不剧烈，不炙热，可是任凭海啸飓风，也矢志不渝。

sentences.english: If an earthquake, hurricane, winter storm, or other disaster strikes your community, you might not have access to food , water, and electricity for days or even weeks.
sentences.chinese: 如果有地震、飓风、暴风雪或其他的灾害突袭你的家园，你可能会好几天甚至好几个星期都得不到食物、水和电。

detailed_translations.english: a storm that has very strong fast winds and that moves over water

sentences.english: If we hurry, we’ll get there in time.
sentences.chinese: 要是赶紧的话，我们能及时到那里。

sentences.english: I hate having to hurry a meal.
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌匆匆忙忙地吃饭。

sentences.english: We’ll have to hurry, otherwise we’ll miss the start.
sentences.chinese: 我们得赶紧，否则就会错过开头部分了。

sentences.english: There’s no need to hurry. We’ve got plenty of time.
sentences.chinese: 不必匆忙，我们有的是时间。

detailed_translations.english: to do something or go somewhere more quickly than usual, especially because there is not much time
to make someone do something more quickly

name: hurt hurt hurt
trans: vt. 伤害，受伤；伤人感情 【一般现在 过去式 过去分词】

sentences.english: Have you met my husband Roy?
sentences.chinese: 你见过我的丈夫罗伊吗？

detailed_translations.english: the man that a woman is married to

sentences.english: Water contains hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 水含有氢和氧。

sentences.english: Water can be reduced to oxygen and hydrogen by electrolysis.
sentences.chinese: 水通过电解可以分解为氧和氢。

sentences.english: The first bubbles to escape from the liquid are a mixture of air and hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 从该液体中最先逸出的气泡是空气和氢的混合物。

detailed_translations.english: Hydrogen is a colourless gas that is the lightest and commonest element in the universe

sentences.english: I moved to this city six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前我搬到了这个城市。

sentences.english: I’m not late again, am I?
sentences.chinese: 我没有又迟到吧？

sentences.english: My husband and I enjoy going to the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫喜欢去剧院看戏。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself

sentences.english: I'll get you some ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 我去给你拿些冰激凌。

detailed_translations.english: Ice cream is a very cold sweet food made from frozen cream or a substance like cream and has a flavour such as vanilla, chocolate, or strawberry

sentences.english: WHICH country will be the next Iceland?
sentences.chinese: 哪个国家会成为下一个冰岛？

sentences.english: Austria and Turkey beat out Iceland for the two seats allocated to this region.
sentences.chinese: 奥地利和土耳其击败冰岛赢得该地区分配到的两个席位。

detailed_translations.chinese: 冰岛（欧洲岛名，在大西洋北部，近北极圈）

name: idea
trans: n. 主意,意见,打算,想法

sentences.english: You should talk to Ken – he's always full of good ideas.
sentences.chinese: 你应该和肯谈谈，他总是满脑子好主意。

sentences.english: I knew it was a bad idea to leave him on his own.
sentences.chinese: 我知道把他独自留下不是个好主意。

sentences.english: It was my wife’s idea to move house.
sentences.chinese: 要搬家是我妻子的主意。

sentences.english: He has some very strange ideas about education.
sentences.chinese: 他对教育有些非常奇怪的看法。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or suggestion for a possible course of action, especially one that you think of suddenly

sentences.english: The identity of the killer is still unknown.
sentences.chinese: 凶手的身份仍未查明。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s identity is their name or who they are

sentences.english: Do you have any identification?
sentences.chinese: 你有什么身份证明文件吗？

sentences.english: His body was taken to Brighton mortuary for identification.
sentences.chinese: 他的尸体被送到布赖顿停尸所确认身份。

detailed_translations.english: official papers or cards, such as your passport, that prove who you are

sentences.english: ..familiar idioms and metaphors, such as "turning over a new leaf.
sentences.chinese: …如“翻开新的一页”这样熟悉的习语和比喻。

detailed_translations.english: a group of words that has a special meaning that is different from the ordinary meaning of each separate word. For example, ‘under the weather’ is an idiom meaning ‘ill’.

sentences.english: We’ll stay at home if it rains.
sentences.chinese: 如果下雨，我们就待在家里。

sentences.english: If you need money, I can lend you some.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要钱，我能借给你一些。

sentences.english: If I didn’t apologize, I’d feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不道歉，我会感到内疚。

sentences.english: If you had worked harder, you would have passed your exams.
sentences.chinese: 要是你再努力一点，就通过考试了。

sentences.english: What would happen to your family if you were to die in an accident?
sentences.chinese: 要是你在意外事故中身亡，你的家人会怎么样呢？

sentences.english: If Dad were here, he would know what to do.
sentences.chinese: 如果爸爸在这儿，他会知道怎么做的。

sentences.english: Taste the soup and add salt and pepper if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 尝一下汤，需要的话加一点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: I want to get back by five o’clock if possible.
sentences.chinese: 如果可能的话，我想5点之前回来。

sentences.english: I think I can fix it tomorrow. If not, you’ll have to wait till Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我想明天我能修好它，如果不行，你只好等到周五了。

sentences.english: Is the book available, and if so, where?
sentences.chinese: 有没有这本书？ 如果有的话，在哪儿？

sentences.english: The missiles can be fired only if the operator types in a six-digit code.
sentences.chinese: 只有在操作员输入一组六位数密码后，导弹才能发射。

sentences.english: We’ll face that problem if and when it comes along (= if it happens or when it happens ).
sentences.chinese: 如果这一问题真的发生了，我们就要面对它。

sentences.english: If by any chance you can’t manage dinner tonight, perhaps we can at least have a drink together.
sentences.chinese: 万一你今晚不能来吃饭，或许我们至少可以一起喝一杯。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about something that might happen or be true, or might have happened

sentences.english: The phone rang, but she ignored it.
sentences.chinese: 电话铃响了，但她只当没听见。

sentences.english: Sam rudely ignored the question.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆粗鲁地对这个问题不予理睬。

detailed_translations.english: to behave as if you had not heard or seen someone or something

sentences.english: Bridget can’t come – she’s ill.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特不能来了，她生病了。

sentences.english: He was unable to join the army because of ill health.
sentences.chinese: 他因为身体不好没法参军。

sentences.english: The animals had been grossly ill-treated.
sentences.chinese: 那些动物受到了恣意虐待。

detailed_translations.english: suffering from a disease or not feeling well
badly or in an unpleasant way

sentences.english: illegal drugs
sentences.chinese: 违禁药品

sentences.english: They were involved in illegal activities.
sentences.chinese: 他们参与了非法活动。

detailed_translations.english: not allowed by the law

sentences.english: She had all the normal childhood illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 儿童的常见病她小时候都得过。

sentences.english: Her mother was recovering from a serious illness.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲重病后正在逐渐康复。

sentences.english: I’ve never missed a day’s work through illness.
sentences.chinese: 我从未因病耽误过一天工作。

sentences.english: ways to improve your health and reduce the risk of illness
sentences.chinese: 增进健康减少疾病的方法

detailed_translations.english: a disease of the body or mind, or the condition of being ill

sentences.english: Imagine that you have just won a million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 设想你刚刚赢得一百万英镑。

sentences.english: He didn’t quite dare to imagine himself as a real artist.
sentences.chinese: 他不太敢把自己想象成一个真正的艺术家。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

sentences.english: Our immediate response to the attack was sheer horror.
sentences.chinese: 我们对攻击的第一反应就是非常惊恐。

sentences.english: They promise immediate action to help the unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 他们承诺立即采取行动帮助失业者。

sentences.english: If the eyes are affected, seek immediate medical attention.
sentences.chinese: 如果眼睛感染了要立即就医。

sentences.english: The funeral was attended by her immediate family (= her parents, children, brothers and sisters) only.
sentences.chinese: 只有她的直系亲属参加了葬礼。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done at once and without delay

sentences.english: He retired immediately after the end of the war.
sentences.chinese: 战争一结束他就退休了。

sentences.english: Those most immediately involved in the disaster will be given support.
sentences.chinese: 灾害最直接受害者将获得援助。

detailed_translations.english: very soon before or after something

sentences.english: He called for a common European policy on immigration.
sentences.chinese: 他要求欧洲国家实施共同的移民政策。

detailed_translations.english: the process of entering another country in order to live there permanently

sentences.english: a ban on beef imports
sentences.chinese: 禁止进口牛肉

sentences.english: In 2001, Britain exported more cars than it imported.
sentences.chinese: 2001年英国的汽车出口量大于进口

detailed_translations.english: a product that is brought from one country into another so that it can be sold there, or the business of doing this
to bring a product from one country into another so that it can be sold there

sentences.english: He was full of his own importance (= he behaved in an annoying way which showed that he thought he was very important ).
sentences.chinese: 他自以为很了不起。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being important

sentences.english: a very important meeting
sentences.chinese: 很重要的会议

sentences.english: The accident taught him an important lesson.
sentences.chinese: 那次事故给了他很大的教训。

sentences.english: Happiness is more important than money.
sentences.chinese: 快乐比金钱更重要。

sentences.english: ‘What did you say?’ ‘Oh, nothing important.’
sentences.chinese: “你说什么？”“噢，没什么大事。”

sentences.english: It’s vitally important that you understand the danger.
sentences.chinese: 了解危险所在是极为重要的。

sentences.english: a very important customer
sentences.chinese: 一位大客户

detailed_translations.english: an important event, decision, problem etc has a big effect or influence on people’s lives or on events in the future

sentences.english: ‘I want to speak to Mr Franks.’ ‘I’m afraid that’s impossible.’
sentences.chinese: “我想和弗兰克斯先生谈谈。”“恐怕不行。”

sentences.english: It’s impossible to be accurate about these things.
sentences.chinese: 这些事情不可能准确无误 。

sentences.english: The noise made sleep impossible.
sentences.chinese: 噪音吵得人无法睡觉。

sentences.english: Members with young children often found it impossible to attend evening meetings.
sentences.chinese: 有小孩的会员常觉得没法参加晚上的聚会。

sentences.english: It is difficult to find work these days, but for blind people it is virtually impossible.
sentences.chinese: 现在找工作很难，对于盲人来说几乎是不可能。

sentences.english: He was faced with a seemingly impossible task.
sentences.chinese: 他面临着似乎不可能完成的任务。

sentences.english: It was physically impossible to get the fridge through the door.
sentences.chinese: 根本不可能把冰箱从这扇门搬过去。

sentences.english: Six months ago, peace seemed an impossible dream.
sentences.chinese: 六个月前和平还似乎是个无法实现的梦。

sentences.english: Such mental attitudes are difficult, if not impossible, to change.
sentences.chinese: 即使有可能，要改变这样的心态也是很难的。

detailed_translations.english: something that is impossible cannot happen or be done

sentences.english: Steve borrowed his dad’s sports car to impress his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫借来他爸爸的跑车向女友炫耀。

detailed_translations.english: to press something into a soft surface so that a mark or pattern appears on it

sentences.english: When we looked around the school we got a very good impression.
sentences.chinese: 我们参观了学校，对它的印象很好。

sentences.english: I got the impression that she wasn’t very happy with her job.
sentences.chinese: 我有这样的印象，她的工作干得并不愉快。

sentences.english: Some of the fallen trees had left a clear impression in the hardened mud.
sentences.chinese: 有一些倒下的树木在坚硬的泥地上留下了清晰的压痕。

detailed_translations.english: the opinion or feeling you have about someone or something because of the way they seem

sentences.english: a course for students wishing to improve their English
sentences.chinese: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.english: The doctors say she is improving (= after being ill ).
sentences.chinese: 医生说她正在康复。

sentences.english: You could use the money for improving your home.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。

sentences.english: Many wines improve with age (= get better as they get older ).
sentences.chinese: 很多葡萄酒年代越久越香醇。

detailed_translations.english: to make something better, or to become better
to make something better, or to become better

name: in
trans: prep. 在…里(内)；在…；以… ad. 在家，在内，向内

sentences.english: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 碗橱里有一些糖。

sentences.english: My mother was in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲在厨房里。

sentences.english: He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.chinese: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.english: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.english: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 曼森在监狱里待了15年。

sentences.english: a hole in the ground
sentences.chinese: 地上的一个洞

sentences.english: Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.chinese: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.english: My parents live in New Zealand now.
sentences.chinese: 我父母现住在新西兰。

sentences.english: I never went in pubs.
sentences.chinese: 我从不进酒吧。

detailed_translations.english: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is

sentences.english: The curtains were an inch too short.
sentences.chinese: 窗帘短了一英寸。

sentences.english: Rainfall here is under 15 inches a year.
sentences.chinese: 本地的年降雨量不到15英寸。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length, equal to 2.54 centimetres. There are 12 inches in a foot.

sentences.english: His bad behaviour was just an isolated incident.
sentences.chinese: 他的不良行为只是个别事件。

sentences.english: Roads were sealed off because of a major incident.
sentences.chinese: 因为发生重大事故，道路被封锁了。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens, especially sth unusual or unpleasant

sentences.english: Does the price include postage?
sentences.chinese: 这个价格包含邮费吗？

sentences.chinese: 有计划要把这家大企业分割成一些独立的小公司。

sentences.chinese: 缅甸与印度毗邻。

sentences.chinese: 印度政府

detailed_translations.english: relating to India or its people
someone from India

sentences.chinese: 一项对退休人员的调查表明，他们中的大部分人生活自立而愉快。

sentences.english: I work in the oil industry.
sentences.chinese: 我在石油行业工作。

sentences.english: Italy’s thriving tourist industry

sentences.english: Gould is a man of great industry.

sentences.chinese: 他们将把自己所取得的任何进展都告诉他。

sentences.chinese: 我需要更多信息。

sentences.chinese: 安格斯在打橄榄球时弄伤了腿。

sentences.chinese: 她头部受重伤被送到医院。

sentences.chinese: 贝克汉姆因伤错过了几场比赛。

sentences.chinese: 请用黑色墨水书写。

sentences.chinese: 我们想使船靠岸，朝内陆方向驶去。

sentences.chinese: 1985年，一座冰川在海滨融化，自那时起冰川已经向内陆退缩了半英里。

sentences.chinese: 我们住在假日酒店。

sentences.chinese: 她过去一直认为格雷格在关于女人方面是一个不可救药的无知者。

detailed_translations.english: not guilty of a crime

sentences.chinese: 昆虫的叮咬

sentences.chinese: 他把钥匙藏在领带里面。

sentences.chinese: 我们需要一个能鼓舞团队士气的人。

sentences.chinese: 十分有趣的电视节目

sentences.chinese: 你见过什么有意思的人吗？

sentences.chinese: 竟然没人记得见过这辆车，真是有趣。

sentences.chinese: 国际社会的反响

sentences.chinese: 联合国和其他国际组织

sentences.chinese: 艾哈迈德通过口译者说:“我很担心我的妻子和孩子们。”

sentences.chinese: 别打断我的话！

sentences.chinese: 他离开房间，过了一会儿就带回来一条消息。

sentences.chinese: 我们可以在幕间休息时喝点什么。

sentences.chinese: 树已按均距栽种。

sentences.chinese: 在面试时呈递的工作成果样本

sentences.chinese: 警方问讯

sentences.english: We’re interviewing six candidates for the job.
sentences.chinese: 这份工作我们要面试六名申请人。

to ask someone questions during an interview

sentences.english: Come into the office.
sentences.chinese: 到办公室里来。

sentences.english: He thrust his hand into his coat pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他把手插进大衣口袋里。

sentences.english: There must be another way into the cave.
sentences.chinese: 一定有其他的路可以进入洞穴。

sentences.chinese: 休回到床上，拉过被子蒙住头。

sentences.english: I’ve got to go into town this morning.
sentences.chinese: 我今天上午得进城去。

sentences.english: We dived into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我们跳进海里。

sentences.chinese: 几位参议员提交了针对性骚扰的立法议案。

sentences.chinese: 皮特，你来作一下介绍吧。

sentences.english: Our first contestant needs no introduction (= everyone already knows the person ).
sentences.chinese: 我们的第一位参赛者就不用介绍了。

sentences.chinese: 约2,000年前佛教传入中国

sentences.english: In the introduction, he explains why he wrote the book.
sentences.chinese: 在引言里，他解释了写这本书的原因。

sentences.english: Alexander Graham Bell invented the telephone in 1876.
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大 · 格雷厄姆 · 贝尔于1876年发明了电话。

detailed_translations.english: to make, design, or think of a new type of thing

sentences.english: The invention of the computer has revolutionized the business world.
sentences.chinese: 电脑的发明使商界发生了根本变化。

sentences.english: They subsequently admitted that the story was pure invention.
sentences.chinese: 他们后来承认他们说的纯属虚构。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发明，创造；捏造， 假话
detailed_translations.english: the act of inventing something

sentences.english: Alexander Graham Bell, the inventor of the telephone
sentences.chinese: 亚历山大·格雷厄姆·贝尔，电话的发明者

detailed_translations.english: someone who has invented something, or whose job is to invent things

sentences.english: an invitation to speak at a scientific conference
sentences.chinese: 在科学大会上发言的邀请

sentences.english: We sent out more than 300 wedding invitations.
sentences.chinese: 我们发出了超过300份婚礼请柬。

detailed_translations.english: a written or spoken request to someone, inviting them to go somewhere or do something

sentences.english: I’m afraid I wasn’t invited.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我没有受到邀请。

sentences.english: Successful candidates will be invited for interview next week.
sentences.chinese: 通过甄别的候选人将获邀于下周参加面试。

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone to come to a party, wedding, meal etc

sentences.chinese: 我们还以为你去爱尔兰了呢，原来你并没去呀。

sentences.chinese: 词源学：越过英格兰，从一个陆地到另一个陆地，爱尔兰。

sentences.chinese: 爱尔兰，葡萄牙和希腊都需要救助。

trans: a. 爱尔兰的，爱尔兰人的

sentences.chinese: 我开始感觉到或许就是我以及像我这样的人，该受责备，因为就是我们，让爱尔兰人民，正在为我们的工作、生活、医疗卫生和教育买单。

sentences.english: On the other hand, the Irish are also right to be suspicious of intentions in Brussels and Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，爱尔兰对于柏林和布鲁塞尔的意图持怀疑态度也是有道理的。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Ireland or its people

detailed_translations.chinese: 爱尔兰人；爱尔兰语；爱尔兰
detailed_translations.english: people from Ireland

trans: n. 铁，熨斗 vt. 熨烫

sentences.english: the iron and steel industry
sentences.chinese: 钢铁工业

sentences.chinese: 安装了大铁门的私家车道

sentences.english: the absorption of iron from food
sentences.chinese: 对食物中铁的吸收

sentences.english: ...a man of icy nerve and iron will.
sentences.chinese: …一个头脑冷静、意志坚强的男人。

detailed_translations.english: a common hard metal that is used to make steel, is  magnetic  , and is found in very small quantities in food and blood. It is a chemical  element  : symbol Fe
to make clothes smooth using an iron
You can use iron to describe the character or behaviour of someone who is very firm in their decisions and actions, or who can control their feelings well

sentences.english: The water in Lake Powell is used to irrigate the area.
sentences.chinese: 包尔湖的水被用来灌溉该地区。

detailed_translations.english: to supply land or crops with water

sentences.english: Small blockages or collapses of the canal would choke the intricate irrigation networks.
sentences.chinese: 运河的小堵塞或倒塌都会阻塞整个负责的灌溉网络。

sentences.english: In the United States, by contrast, 41% goes for agriculture, almost all of it for irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 与之相比，美国全年41%的水投向了农业，并几乎全都用在了灌溉上。

sentences.english: Spray irrigation sprinkling water over land to be used for crops. often used to dispose of wastewater from sewage treatment plants.
sentences.chinese: 喷洒灌溉，喷灌把水喷洒于准备种植作物的土地上。常常使用经过污水厂处理过的废水。

sentences.english: I live on an island.
sentences.chinese: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.english: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.english: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.chinese: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land completely surrounded by water

sentences.english: ‘Where’s your office?’ ‘It’s on the third floor.’
sentences.chinese: “你的办公室在哪儿？”“在三楼。”

sentences.english: I love the spring – it’s a wonderful time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢春季——这是一年里最美妙的时节。

sentences.english: There were people crying, buildings on fire. It was terrible!
sentences.chinese: 有人在哭喊，楼房在燃烧―太可怕了！

sentences.english: Don’t blame me. It wasn’t my idea.
sentences.chinese: 不要责备我，这不是我的主意。

sentences.english: This little beast is a lemur and it lives in Madagascar.
sentences.chinese: 这小动物是狐猴，生活在马达加斯加。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a thing, animal, situation, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about

name: Italian
trans: a. 意大利(人)的；意大利语的 n. 意大利人；意大利语

sentences.english: I watch Italian football a lot.
sentences.chinese: 我常看意大利足球。

sentences.english: The Italian way is to round off a meal with an ice-cream.
sentences.chinese: 意大利人总是在用餐结束时来份冰激凌。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Italy, its people, or its language
someone from Italy

sentences.english: They decided to swan around Italy this summer.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定今年夏天去意大利游逛。

sentences.english: French troops negotiated the Alps and went on the road in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 法军成功地越过了阿尔卑斯山脉，行军在意大利的国土上。

sentences.english: All the newspapers reported on the football match of France versus Italy.
sentences.chinese: 所有的报纸都报道了法国队对意大利队的足球比赛。

sentences.english: He emphasized its importance to me.
sentences.chinese: 他向我强调它的重要性。

sentences.english: The child read the story but did not comprehend its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子读了这篇故事，但不能理解它的意思。

sentences.english: The company disseminated information about its new programmes.
sentences.chinese: 公司传播有关其新计划的信息。

sentences.english: The cat lay on the sofa, washing itself.
sentences.chinese: 猫躺在沙发上把自己舔干。

sentences.english: The machine switches itself off when the process is complete.
sentences.chinese: 工作程序结束，机器会自动关闭。

sentences.english: a small local enterprise that has transformed itself into a highly successful company
sentences.chinese: 已发展为业绩喜人的公司的一家小型地方企业

detailed_translations.english: used to show that a thing, organization, animal, or baby that does something is affected by its own action

sentences.chinese: 他拉开夹克衫的拉链。

sentences.english: The bitter wind cut through his jacket.
sentences.chinese: 刺骨的冷风吹透了他的夹克衫。

sentences.english: When I grew out of my jacket,I gave it to my little brother.
sentences.chinese: 我长得穿不下我的夹克衫了，便把它给我弟弟穿。

detailed_translations.english: a short light coat

sentences.chinese: 草莓酱

sentences.english: a jam sandwich
sentences.chinese: 果酱三明治

sentences.english: jam jars
sentences.chinese: 果酱罐

detailed_translations.english: a thick sweet substance made from boiled fruit and sugar, eaten especially on bread

detailed_translations.chinese: 使堵塞；挤进，使塞满；混杂；压碎

sentences.english: We always have snow in January.
sentences.chinese: 我们这里1月份总会下雪。

detailed_translations.english: the first month of the year, between December and February

sentences.chinese: 我们从中国启航驶往日本。

trans: a. 日本的，日本人的，日语的 n. 日本人，日语

sentences.english: a Japanese car
sentences.chinese: 日本(汽)车

sentences.english: At least three British golf courses are now owned by the Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 现在英国至少有3家高尔夫球场为日本人所有。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Japan, its people, or its language
people from Japan

sentences.english: a jam jar
sentences.chinese: 果酱罐

sentences.english: half a jar of peanut butter
sentences.chinese: 半瓶花生酱

sentences.english: The ship jarred a little.
sentences.chinese: 船轻微震了一下。

sentences.english: The sudden movement jarred the box and it fell off the table.
sentences.chinese: 这突然一动震动了那个箱子，然后它从桌上掉了下去。

detailed_translations.english: a glass container with a wide top and a lid, used for storing food such as jam or honey, or the amount it contains

detailed_translations.chinese: 冲突；不一致；震惊；发刺耳声
detailed_translations.english: If an object jars, or if something jars it, the object moves with a fairly hard shaking movement

sentences.english: He punched him on the jaw.
sentences.chinese: 他一拳打在他的下巴上。

sentences.english: a rugged physique and a strong square jaw
sentences.chinese: 强健的体格以及结实的方下巴

sentences.english: She’s got a very determined jaw.
sentences.chinese: 她一脸坚毅。

detailed_translations.english: the lower part of your face. Its shape is sometimes thought to show your character

name: jazz
trans: n. 爵士音乐，爵士舞曲

sentences.english: a jazz band
sentences.chinese: 爵士乐队

sentences.english: a jazz club
sentences.chinese: 爵士乐俱乐部

sentences.english: modern jazz
sentences.chinese: 现代爵士乐

detailed_translations.english: a type of music that has a strong beat and parts for performers to play alone

detailed_translations.chinese: 奏爵士乐，跳爵士舞；游荡

sentences.chinese: …一个穿着牛仔裤和破旧T恤衫的年轻人。

detailed_translations.english: trousers made of denim(= a strong, usually blue, cotton cloth )

sentences.english: ...a U.S. Army Jeep.
sentences.chinese: …一辆美军吉普车。

detailed_translations.english: A Jeep is a type of car that can travel over rough ground

name: jet
trans: n. 喷气式飞机；喷射（器）

sentences.english: He owns a private jet.
sentences.chinese: 他拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 喷射，喷嘴；喷气式飞机；黑玉

if a liquid or gas jets out from somewhere, it comes quickly out of a small hole

sentences.chinese: 她喜欢穿上盛装，戴上极为昂贵的珠宝首饰。

detailed_translations.english: a valuable stone, such as a diamond

sentences.english: We have purchased some valuable jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 我们购置了几件贵重的珠宝饰物。

sentences.english: The robbers buried the jewelry chest on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 盗贼们把珠宝箱埋藏在山上。

sentences.english: They buy jewelry and clothes for themselves with images of cats on them.
sentences.chinese: 他们为自己购买带有猫咪图象的珠宝饰物和衣服。

sentences.english: Do you enjoy your job?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢自己的工作吗？

sentences.english: It was the first paid job I ever had.
sentences.chinese: 这是我第一份拿工资的工作。

sentences.english: He’s been in the job for six years.
sentences.chinese: 他干这份工作有六年了。

sentences.english: I’m looking for a new job.
sentences.chinese: 我在找一份新工作。

sentences.english: Your pension can be affected if you change jobs.
sentences.chinese: 换工作的话，会影响到你的退休金。

sentences.english: Sam does odd jobs(= small jobs in the house or garden ) for friends and neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆为朋友和邻居打打零工。

detailed_translations.english: the regular paid work that you do for an employer

sentences.english: I go jogging every morning.
sentences.chinese: 我每天早晨都去慢跑。

detailed_translations.chinese: 慢跑；轻推；蹒跚行进；使颠簸
detailed_translations.english: to run slowly and steadily, especially as a way of exercising
a slow steady run, especially done as a way of exercising

sentences.english: Many sacrificed their weekend to join the hunt for the missing girl.
sentences.chinese: 许多人牺牲周末时间，加入了寻找失踪女孩的行动。

sentences.english: the benefits of joining our pension scheme
sentences.chinese: 参加我们的退休金计划的好处

sentences.english: Church leaders have joined the campaign to end foxhunting.
sentences.chinese: 教会领袖参与了禁止猎狐的运动。

sentences.english: Join the two pieces of wood with strong glue.
sentences.chinese: 用强力胶水把两块木头黏合起来。

detailed_translations.english: to begin to take part in an activity that other people are involved in

sentences.english: I couldn’t go out with someone for a joke, could you?
sentences.chinese: 我可不能拿谈恋爱当儿戏，对不对？

sentences.english: I never joke about money.
sentences.chinese: 我从不拿钱开玩笑。

detailed_translations.english: something that you say or do to make people laugh, especially a funny story or trick

sentences.english: a well-known journalist and broadcaster
sentences.chinese: 一位著名的新闻记者兼播音员

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes news reports for newspapers, magazines, television, or radio

sentences.english: the friends they made on the journey
sentences.chinese: 他们在旅途中交下的朋友

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when you travel from one place to another, especially over a long distance
an occasion when you travel from one place to another, especially over a long distance

sentences.english: the look of joy on her face
sentences.chinese: 她脸上的喜悦表情

sentences.english: The garden was his pride and joy.
sentences.chinese: 这座花园是他的骄傲和乐趣所在。

detailed_translations.english: great happiness and pleasure

name: judge
trans: n. 裁判；审判员；法官vt. 判断，断定

sentences.english: You should never judge a person by their looks.
sentences.chinese: 决不要以貌取人。

sentences.english: Judge us on the improvements we make in the economy.
sentences.chinese: 请根据我们在经济方面取得的进步来评价我们。

sentences.english: The therapist judged that Margaret had made a serious attempt to kill herself.
sentences.chinese: 治疗专家断定玛格丽特曾真的企图自杀。

sentences.english: pollutants that were judged hazardous to human health
sentences.chinese: 被认为对人体健康有害的污染物

sentences.english: I am in no position to judge whether what she is doing is right or wrong.
sentences.chinese: 我无权评判她在做的事是对是错。

sentences.english: The economic results of the reforms are very difficult to judge.
sentences.chinese: 这些改革所带来的经济成效很难评价。

sentences.english: The likelihood of future bombs was impossible to judge.
sentences.chinese: 未来发生爆炸案的可能性无法预测。

sentences.english: We judge the success of a product by the number of sales it brings in.
sentences.chinese: 我们以销量来评价一种产品成功与否。

sentences.english: His conduct, judged objectively by what he has done, is dishonest.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为，从他所做的这一切客观地来评价，是不诚实的。

sentences.english: Robert wanted to go and help him, but judged it best to stay where he was.
sentences.chinese: 罗伯特想过去帮他，但考虑之后还是觉得待在原地为妙。

sentences.english: Do not judge her too harshly, as she was very young at the time.
sentences.chinese: 对她的评价不要太苛刻，毕竟那时候她还很年轻。

detailed_translations.english: to form or give an opinion about someone or something after thinking carefully about all the information you know about them
the official in control of a court, who decides how criminals should be punished

sentences.english: He trusted in his judgement.
sentences.chinese: 他相信他的判断。

sentences.english: All action is based on judgement.
sentences.chinese: 一切行动均以判断为基础。

sentences.english: The judgement is often biased by interest.
sentences.chinese: 判断往往因利害关系而有偏差。

sentences.english: a carton of orange juice
sentences.chinese: 一纸盒橙汁

sentences.english: A Coke and a tomato juice, please.
sentences.chinese: 请来一杯可乐和一杯番茄汁。

detailed_translations.english: the liquid that comes from fruit and vegetables, or a drink that is made from this

sentences.english: a juicy lemon
sentences.chinese: 多汁的柠檬

detailed_translations.chinese: 多汁的；利润多的；生动的
detailed_translations.english: containing a lot of juice

sentences.chinese: 但是从二月到七月，乔伊又无事可做了。

sentences.english: People still remembered the earthquake that had jarred this region last July.
sentences.chinese: 人们仍然记得去年七月发生的使该地区产生剧烈震动的那次地震。

sentences.english: One July a couple of years ago I took my supper with a Captain Moran on board the S.S. Margaret, that had put into a western river from I know not where.
sentences.chinese: 两年前的七月，我在玛格丽特号船上和一位名叫莫兰的船长共进晚餐，这艘船从我不熟悉的一个地方出发，驶往爱尔兰西部的某条河流。

name: jump
trans: n. 跳跃；跳变 v. 跳跃；惊起；猛扑

sentences.english: The cats jumped down and came to meet us.
sentences.chinese: 这些猫跳下来，过来迎接我们。

detailed_translations.english: to let yourself drop from a place that is above the ground
to let yourself drop from a place that is above the ground

sentences.english: He spent two and a half weeks with us in June 1986.
sentences.chinese: 1986年6月，他和我们呆了两个半星期。

detailed_translations.english: the sixth month of the year, between May and July

sentences.english: the Amazon jungle
sentences.chinese: 亚马孙丛林

detailed_translations.english: a thick tropical forest with many large plants growing very close together

sentences.english: She now lives with actor Denis Lawson, 10 years her junior.
sentences.chinese: 她现在和比她小10岁的演员丹尼斯·劳森同居。

detailed_translations.english: If you are someone's junior, you are younger than they are

sentences.chinese: 这个壁橱里塞满了杂物。

detailed_translations.english: old or unwanted objects that have no use or value
to get rid of something because it is old or useless

name: junk mail

sentences.english: Sharon fears that her love of junk food may have contributed to her cancer.
sentences.chinese: 莎伦怕她对垃圾食品的喜好可能导致了她的癌症。

detailed_translations.english: food that is not healthy, for example because it contains a lot of fat, sugar etc

name: just
trans: ad. 刚才；恰好；不过；仅 a. 公正的

sentences.english: A good strong cup of coffee is just what I need right now.
sentences.chinese: 我现在正需要喝一杯浓浓的咖啡。

sentences.english: The house was large and roomy; just right for us.
sentences.chinese: 那幢房子大而宽敞，正合我们的需要。

sentences.english: She looks just like her mother.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去就像她妈妈。

sentences.english: It’s nothing serious – just a small cut.
sentences.chinese: 不要紧，只不过是个小伤口。

sentences.english: John’s just told me that he’s getting married.
sentences.chinese: 约翰刚刚告诉我他要结婚了。

detailed_translations.english: exactly

sentences.english: Children have a strong sense of justice.
sentences.chinese: 儿童有很强的正义感。

sentences.english: His people came to him demanding justice.
sentences.chinese: 他的手下来找他，寻求公正。

detailed_translations.english: fairness in the way people are treated

sentences.english: The kangaroo has a problem.
sentences.chinese: 这只袋鼠有一个难题。

sentences.english: This is the kangaroo from Australia.
sentences.chinese: 这是一只来自澳洲的袋鼠。

sentences.english: Thanks to special bacteria in their stomachs, kangaroo flatulence contains no methane and scientists want to transfer that bacteria to cattle and sheep who emit large quantities of the harmful gas.
sentences.chinese: 袋鼠胃中有一种特殊的细菌能使其放的屁中不含有甲烷。 科学家想将这种细菌移至牛羊的胃中，以抑制它们所排放的大量有害气体。

detailed_translations.english: an Australian animal that moves by jumping and carries its babies in a pouch (= a special pocket of skin ) on its stomach

name: keep kept kept
trans: v. 保持；保存；继续不断 vt. 培育，饲养 【一般现在 过去式 过去分词】

name: keeper
trans: n. （动物园中的）饲养员，看守人

sentences.english: a beekeeper
sentences.chinese: 养蜂人

sentences.english: Bob is head lion keeper at the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃是动物园养狮主管。

sentences.english: a lighthouse keeper
sentences.chinese: 灯塔管理员

detailed_translations.english: someone who looks after animals

sentences.english: She filled the kettle and switched it on.
sentences.chinese: 她把水壶灌满，打开了开关。

sentences.english: The kettle’s boiling (= the water in it is boiling ).
sentences.chinese: 水壶里的水开了。

sentences.english: (= start boiling water in a kettle ), will you?
sentences.chinese: 烧壶水，好吗？

sentences.chinese: 把肉放进一个小锅里。

sentences.chinese: 他的皮带上挂着一串钥匙。

sentences.english: Press the ‘Escape’ key to exit.
sentences.chinese: 按退出键退出。

sentences.english: Check your answers in the key at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 用书后的解答核对答案。
