sentences.english: The garden needs watering daily.
sentences.chinese: 花园每天都需要浇水。

detailed_translations.english: the clear liquid without colour, smell, or taste that falls as rain and that is used for drinking, washing etc
if you water plants or the ground they are growing in, you pour water on them

sentences.english: Oh, what a big watermelon!
sentences.chinese: 喔唷， 这么大的西瓜!

sentences.english: A watermelon is red inside and green outside.
sentences.chinese: 西瓜内红外绿。

sentences.english: This kind of watermelon is remarkable for its size.
sentences.chinese: 这种西瓜个头儿大。

detailed_translations.english: a large round fruit with hard green skin, red flesh, and black seeds

name: wave
trans: n. （热、光、声等的）波，波浪 v. 挥手，挥动，波动

sentences.english: Dee watched the waves breaking on the shore.
sentences.chinese: 迪伊凝视着拍岸的波涛。

sentences.english: The ship tipped over, and finally vanished beneath the waves.
sentences.chinese: 船倾覆了，最终沉没在海浪之下。

detailed_translations.english: a line of raised water that moves across the surface of the sea
if you wave something, or if it waves, it moves from side to side

sentences.english: wax crayons
sentences.chinese: 蜡笔

detailed_translations.english: a solid substance made of fat or oil and used to make candles, polish etc
to rub a layer of wax into a floor, surface etc to protect it or make it shine

sentences.english: My family was in a bad way financially.
sentences.chinese: 我家当时经济窘迫。

sentences.english: The chicken’s nice and crispy – just the way I like it.
sentences.chinese: 这鸡肉很脆，正是我喜欢的口味。

sentences.english: It’s worth thinking how you can improve the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 你应该想想如何让现状变得更好。

detailed_translations.english: a particular state or condition

sentences.english: How is it that the successful motivate themselves to keep at it when others fall by the wayside?
sentences.chinese: 当其他人跌倒在路旁时，他们是如何激发自己坚持下去的？

sentences.english: To instance only one point: till then I had cared very little about plants and flowers, but now I found myself eagerly interested in every blossom, in every growth of the wayside.
sentences.chinese: 只要举个例子就看得出来了：在这之前，我很少留意于草木花卉，可是现在我发现自己对路边每朵绽开的鲜花、每根生长的小草都兴趣十足。

sentences.english: She beheld the minister advancing along the path, entirely alone, and leaning on a staff which he had cut by the wayside.
sentences.chinese: 她看到牧师正沿着小径走来，他只身一人，只是手中接着一根从路边砍下的手杖。

detailed_translations.english: the side of a road

sentences.english: ‘Did you go into the supermarket?’ ‘No, we didn’t.’
sentences.chinese: “你们进超级市场了吗？”“我们没有进去。”

sentences.english: Shall we stop for a coffee?
sentences.chinese: 我们停下来喝杯咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: So we all travelled down to Brighton together.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们一起都去了布赖顿。

sentences.english: We declare our support for a government of national unity.
sentences.chinese: 我们宣布支持一个全国统一的政府。

sentences.english: We Italians are proud of our history.
sentences.chinese: 我们意大利人为自己的历史感到自豪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 我们（主格）；笔者，本人（作者或演讲人使用）；朕，寡人
detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people

sentences.english: a web of streets
sentences.chinese: 纵横交错的街道

sentences.english: We were caught in a tangled web of relationships.
sentences.chinese: 我们陷入了错综复杂的人际关系网络。

detailed_translations.english: a complicated pattern of things that are closely connected to each other

sentences.english: For more information on weight loss and healthy eating, visit our website.
sentences.chinese: 有关减肥和健康饮食的更多信息，请访问我们的网站。

detailed_translations.chinese: 网站（全球资讯网的主机站）
detailed_translations.english: a place on the Internet where you can find information about something, especially a particular organization

sentences.english: The illness left her feeling weak.
sentences.chinese: 疾病使她感到身体虚弱。

sentences.english: Poor light produces weak plants.
sentences.chinese: 光照不足，植物就生长不好。

sentences.english: The animal was weak from loss of blood.
sentences.chinese: 那只动物因失血而虚弱无力。

detailed_translations.chinese: [经] 疲软的；虚弱的；无力的；不牢固的
detailed_translations.english: not physically strong

sentences.english: The legislation has a fundamental weakness.
sentences.chinese: 这项立法有一个根本性缺陷。

sentences.english: The plan has strengths and weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划既有优点又有缺点。

sentences.english: muscular weakness
sentences.chinese: 肌无力

sentences.english: weakness in the economy
sentences.chinese: 经济疲软

detailed_translations.english: a fault in someone’s character or in a system, organization, design etc

sentences.english: The country’s wealth comes from its oil.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的财富来自石油。

sentences.english: the distribution of wealth
sentences.chinese: 财富的分配

sentences.english: The purpose of industry is to create wealth.
sentences.chinese: 工业的目的就是创造财富。

detailed_translations.chinese: 财富； 财产； 丰富
detailed_translations.english: a large amount of money, property etc that a person or country owns

sentences.english: the wealthy nations of the world
sentences.chinese: 世界上的富国

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of money, possessions etc

name: wear wore worn
trans: v. 穿，戴 【一般现在 过去式 过去分词】

sentences.english: What’s the weather like today?
sentences.chinese: 今天天气如何？

sentences.english: The weather turned bitterly cold.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很冷了。

detailed_translations.english: the temperature and other conditions such as sun, rain, and wind

detailed_translations.chinese: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
detailed_translations.english: if rock, wood, or someone’s face is weathered by the wind, sun, rain etc, or if it weathers, it changes colour or shape over a period of time

sentences.english: In just 50 weeks Dan tried everything from being a lobster catcher, a jazz conductor, a TV weatherman and even a Las Vegas wedding planner.
sentences.chinese: 于是在50个礼拜之内，从捕龙虾、爵士乐指挥，电视天气预报，甚至拉斯维加斯的婚庆服务，他都一一尝试。

sentences.english: The weatherman says we’ll have a cold spell before the end of this week.
sentences.chinese: 天气预报员说,在这个周末之前,会有一阵子的冷天气。

detailed_translations.english: a man on television or radio who tells you what the weather will be like

sentences.english: She’s busy planning her daughter’s wedding.
sentences.chinese: 她正忙着筹备女儿的婚礼。

sentences.english: When is the wedding?
sentences.chinese: 婚礼是什么时候？

detailed_translations.english: a marriage ceremony, especially one with a religious service

sentences.english: He undertook to finish the job by Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 他答应在星期三以前完成这项工作。

sentences.english: They have to vacate their offices before Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须在星期三以前将办公室腾出来。

sentences.english: The foreign guests will call on you next Wednesday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 外宾将在下周星期三下午拜访你。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Tuesday and Thursday

sentences.english: the constant battle against weeds
sentences.chinese: 对付杂草的长期斗争

sentences.english: I've been weeding the flower beds.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在除花坛里的杂草。

detailed_translations.english: a wild plant growing where it is not wanted that prevents crops or garden flowers from growing properly
to remove unwanted plants from a garden or other place

sentences.english: I can’t see you this week.
sentences.chinese: 我这星期不能见你。

detailed_translations.english: a period of seven days and nights, usually measured in Britain from Monday to Sunday and in the US from Sunday to Saturday

sentences.english: If you want to avoid the crowds, it's best to come on a weekday.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想避开人流，最好在工作日来。

detailed_translations.english: any day of the week except Saturday and Sunday

sentences.english: Are you doing anything nice this weekend?
sentences.chinese: 这个周末你有什么好的安排？

sentences.english: Tony has been unwell over the weekend (= during the weekend ).
sentences.chinese: 托尼这个周末身体不舒服。

sentences.english: We’re going to Paris for a long weekend (= Saturday and Sunday, and also Friday or Monday, or both ).
sentences.chinese: 我们要到巴黎去度一个长周末。

detailed_translations.chinese: 周末，周末休假；周末聚会
detailed_translations.english: Saturday and Sunday, especially considered as time when you do not work
to spend the weekend somewhere

sentences.english: The group meets weekly.
sentences.chinese: 小组每周见面一次。

detailed_translations.english: Weekly is also an adverb
happening or done every week

sentences.english: James broke down and wept.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯控制不住感情，哭了起来。

sentences.english: He wept bitterly (= cried a lot ) when it was time for us to leave.
sentences.chinese: 我们要分别的时候他痛哭了一场。

detailed_translations.english: to cry, especially because you feel very sad

sentences.english: The young birds weigh only a few grams.
sentences.chinese: 雏鸟重量只有几克。

sentences.english: Do you know how much it weighs?
sentences.chinese: 你知道它的重量吗？

sentences.english: (= how much ) do you weigh?
sentences.chinese: 你的体重是多少？

sentences.english: The box was full of books and weighed a ton (= was very heavy ).
sentences.chinese: 这箱子里放满了书，重得很。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular weight

sentences.english: The average weight of a baby at birth is just over seven pounds.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿的平均出生体重是七磅多一点。

sentences.english: It can be sewn into curtain hems to weight the curtain and so allow it to hang better.
sentences.chinese: 可以把它缝在窗帘的摺边里以增加窗帘的重量，使之更有下垂感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 重量，重力；负担；砝码；重要性
detailed_translations.english: how heavy something is when you measure it
If you weight something, you make it heavier by adding something to it, for example, in order to stop it from moving easily

name: welcome
trans: int.n. & v.欢迎 a. 受欢迎的

sentences.english: I had the feeling I wasn’t really welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到我其实不受欢迎。

sentences.english: I didn’t feel welcome in the club.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我在俱乐部里不受欢迎。

sentences.english: Mary made us very welcome.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽让我们感觉很受欢迎。

sentences.english: We try to make the new students feel welcome.
sentences.chinese: 我们尽量让新同学感到自己是受欢迎的。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is welcome in a place, other people are glad that they are there
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place
to say hello in a friendly way to someone who has just arrived
the way in which you greet someone when they arrive at a place

sentences.english: Our only concern is the children’s welfare.
sentences.chinese: 我们唯一关心的是孩子们的幸福。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s welfare is their health and happiness

name: well
trans: (better, best) ad. 好,令人满意地,完全地 a.好的,,健康的int. 表示惊讶同意或犹豫等,亦用于接话语;好吧,那么,哎呀 n. 井

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: James reads quite well for his age.
sentences.chinese: 就詹姆斯的年龄来说，他的阅读能力算不错了。

sentences.english: All the team played very well today.
sentences.chinese: 今天所有队员都打得很不错。

sentences.english: Simon doesn’t work well under pressure.
sentences.chinese: 有压力时西蒙的工作表现就不好。

sentences.english: The festival was very well organized.
sentences.chinese: 节庆活动组织得很好。

sentences.english: The concert went very well.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会进行得非常顺利。

detailed_translations.chinese: 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地
detailed_translations.english: in a successful or satisfactory way
healthy

sentences.english: This is probably their best-known song.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是他们最有名的歌曲。

sentences.english: a well-known TV presenter
sentences.chinese: 著名的电视节目主持人

detailed_translations.chinese: 众所周知的， 著名的
detailed_translations.english: known by a lot of people

name: west
trans: a. (在)西；向西,从西来的 ad. 在西方,向西方 n.西部；西方

sentences.english: The route then heads west over Gerrick Moor.
sentences.chinese: 之后这条路折向西，穿过格里克漠泽。

sentences.english: the west door of the church
sentences.chinese: 教堂的西门

sentences.english: A damp wind blew from the west.
sentences.chinese: 从西面吹来一股潮湿的风。

sentences.english: a west-facing window
sentences.chinese: 朝西的窗户

detailed_translations.english: towards the west
in the west or facing the west
the direction towards which the sun goes down, and which is on the left if you are facing north

sentences.english: the western end of the bay
sentences.chinese: 海湾的西端

sentences.english: Western Australia
sentences.chinese: 西澳大利亚

detailed_translations.chinese: 西方的，西部的；有西方特征的
detailed_translations.english: in or from the west of a country or area

detailed_translations.chinese: 西方人；西部片，西部小说
detailed_translations.english: a film about life in the 19th century in the American West, especially the lives of cowboys

sentences.english: It's the first time a Westerner has been convicted for a drug-related offence in recent years in China.
sentences.chinese: 这是近年来第一次有西方人在中国被判犯有与毒品有关的罪行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 西方人，欧美人；美国西部的人
detailed_translations.english: A westerner is a person who was born in or lives in the United States, Canada, or Western, Northern, or Southern Europe

sentences.english: He sailed westward from Palos de la Frontera.
sentences.chinese: 他从帕洛斯·德拉·弗龙特拉港出发向西航行。

sentences.english: ...the one-hour westward flight over the Andes to Lima.
sentences.chinese: …越过安第斯山脉到利马一小时的向西飞行。

detailed_translations.english: Westward or westwards means toward the west
Westward is also an adjective

sentences.english: I’ve washed your shirt but it’s still wet.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的衬衫洗过了，不过现在还是湿的。

sentences.english: wet grass
sentences.chinese: 湿草地

sentences.english: The man in the boat was wet through (= completely wet ).
sentences.chinese: 船上的那人浑身湿透。

detailed_translations.english: covered in or full of water or another liquid
the rain
to make something wet

sentences.english: The receding tide stranded the whale.
sentences.chinese: 退潮把鲸鱼搁浅在海滩上。

sentences.english: So whale come out fish, because they are fish obviously.
sentences.chinese: 所以鲸鱼就是鱼，因为他们显然是鱼。

sentences.english: This sense of revelation is in part due to our changing attitude towards the whale.
sentences.chinese: 与鲸鱼感到关联部分是由于和我们对鲸鱼态度发生了变化。

detailed_translations.english: a very large animal that lives in the sea and looks like a fish, but is actually a mammal

name: what
trans: pron. 什么,怎么样 a. 多么，何等；什么

sentences.english: Show me what you bought.
sentences.chinese: 给我看看你买的东西。

sentences.english: What he did was morally wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为很缺德。

detailed_translations.english: the thing which

name: whatever
trans: conj. & pron.无论什么，不管什么

sentences.english: She has shown no interest whatever in anything scientific.
sentences.chinese: 凡是与科学有关的她都没有表现出任何兴趣。

sentences.english: This is just a stupid argument that has nothing whatever to do with your job.
sentences.chinese: 这只是一场无聊的争论，和你的工作没有任何关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: [用于否定句中以加强语气]任何； 无论什么
detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize a negative statement

sentences.english: a field of wheat
sentences.chinese: 小麦地

detailed_translations.english: the grain that bread is made from, or the plant that it grows on

sentences.english: Shall I take the wheel (= drive instead of someone else )?
sentences.chinese: 我来开车好吗？

detailed_translations.english: one of the round things under a car, bus, bicycle etc that turns when it moves

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动；使变换方向；给…装轮子
detailed_translations.english: to push something that has wheels somewhere

name: when
trans: conj. 当…的时候 ad. 什么时候，何时

sentences.english: When are we leaving?
sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候走？

sentences.english: When did you first meet Dr Darnall?
sentences.chinese: 你是什么时候认识达纳尔博士的？

sentences.english: When will the work be finished?
sentences.chinese: 这项工作什么时候完成？

sentences.english: I don’t know when I’ll see her again.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道何时才能再见到她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 考虑到；既然；当…时；在…时；如果
什么时候，何时；（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时；其时；当时
detailed_translations.english: at what time

sentences.english: They were always there by you， whenever you needed them.
sentences.chinese: 无论何时你需要他们，他们总是在你身边。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不论何时；随便什么时候
detailed_translations.english: at any time

sentences.english: Where are you going?
sentences.chinese: 你要到哪儿去？

sentences.english: Where do they live?
sentences.chinese: 他们住在哪里？

sentences.english: Do you know where my glasses are?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我的眼镜在哪儿吗？

sentences.english: Where would you like to sit?
sentences.chinese: 你想坐在哪里？

detailed_translations.english: in or to which place

sentences.english: Children will play wherever they happen to be.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子走到哪里玩到哪里。

sentences.english: Sit wherever you like.
sentences.chinese: 随便坐吧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无论什么地方；究竟在哪里
detailed_translations.english: to or at any place, position, or situation

detailed_translations.chinese: 无论在哪里；无论什么情况下

sentences.english: Maurice asked me whether I needed any help.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯问我是否需要帮助。

sentences.english: There were times when I wondered whether or not we would get there.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我也想知道我们能不能做得到。

sentences.english: I didn’t know whether to believe him or not.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道该不该相信他。

sentences.english: The question arose as to whether this behaviour was unlawful.
sentences.chinese: 问题出现了: 这种行为是否不合法？

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about a choice you have to make or about something that is not certain

name: which
trans: pron. 那(哪)一个；那(哪)一些 a.这(哪)个；这(哪)些；无论哪个(些)

sentences.english: Which book are you looking for?
sentences.chinese: 你在找哪本书？

sentences.english: Which are the most important crops?
sentences.chinese: 哪些农作物是最重要的？

sentences.english: Miranda was sure it was one of them, but was not sure which.
sentences.chinese: 米兰达确定此人是他们其中的一个，但不能肯定是哪一个。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about one or more members of a group of people or things, when you are uncertain about it or about them

name: whichever
trans: pron. 无论哪个;无论哪些

sentences.english: Letting taxes rise abruptly would hurt not only the recovery but also whichever party the electorate ended up blaming.
sentences.chinese: 突然的增税不但会妨害经济复苏，而且无论哪个政党这样做都会受到选民指责。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无论哪个， 无论哪些

name: while
trans: conj.在…的时候,和…同时 n. 一会儿，一段时间

sentences.english: They arrived while we were having dinner.
sentences.chinese: 他们来时我们正在吃饭。

sentences.english: While she was asleep, thieves broke in and stole her handbag.
sentences.chinese: 她睡着的时候，小偷闯进来偷走了她的手提包。

sentences.english: She met Andy while working on a production of Carmen.
sentences.chinese: 排练《卡门》时，她认识了安迪。

detailed_translations.english: during the time that something is happening
to spend time in a pleasant and lazy way

sentences.english: You don’t have to whisper, no one can hear us.
sentences.chinese: 你不必轻声轻语，没人听得到我们说话。

sentences.english: ‘I’ve missed you,’ he whispered in her ear.
sentences.chinese: “我想你了。”他在她耳边低语道。

detailed_translations.english: to speak or say something very quietly, using your breath rather than your voice
to speak or say something very quietly, using your breath rather than your voice

sentences.english: The lifeguard blew his whistle.
sentences.chinese: 救生员吹响哨子。

sentences.english: Adam whistled happily on his way to work.
sentences.chinese: 亚当在上班路上愉快地吹着口哨。

detailed_translations.english: a small object that produces a high whistling sound when you blow into it
to make a high or musical sound by blowing air out through your lips

name: white
trans: a. 白色的 n. 白色

sentences.english: young white males
sentences.chinese: 年轻的白种男性

detailed_translations.english: belonging to the race of people with pale skin

sentences.english: Who locked the door?
sentences.chinese: 谁锁的门？

sentences.english: Who do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你为谁工作？

sentences.english: Who’s that guy with your wife?
sentences.chinese: 和你妻子在一起的那个人是谁？

sentences.english: They never found out who the murderer was.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直未查出谁是凶犯。

sentences.english: She wondered who had sent the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道是谁送的花。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about which person is involved, or what the name of a person is

sentences.english: You have your whole life ahead of you!
sentences.chinese: 你有一辈子要过呢！

sentences.english: His whole attitude bugs me.
sentences.chinese: 他的整个态度都让我讨厌。

sentences.english: We ate the whole cake in about ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 大约十分钟的时间，我们就把整个蛋糕都给吃完了。

sentences.english: The whole thing (= everything about the situation ) just makes me sick.
sentences.chinese: 这一切简直让我恶心。

sentences.english: We just sat around and watched TV the whole time (= the only thing we did was watch television ).
sentences.chinese: 我们一直都只是坐着看看电视。

sentences.english: I don’t believe she’s telling us the whole story (= all the facts ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为她没有告诉我们全部实情。

sentences.english: It was months before the whole truth came out.
sentences.chinese: 几个月以后才真相大白。

detailed_translations.english: all of something
something that consists of a number of parts, but is considered as a single unit

sentences.english: From whom shall I get comfort?
sentences.chinese: 我从谁那儿能得到安慰呢?

sentences.english: The dispute at the moment revolved about the question of whom to send.
sentences.chinese: 当时的争论是围绕着派谁去好这一问题而进行的。

sentences.english: So who are your real friends and whose real friends are you?
sentences.chinese: 而谁是你的真正的朋友，你又是谁的真正的朋友呢？

sentences.english: That’s the man whose house has burned down. ＃
sentences.chinese: 就是那个男人的房子被烧毁了。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask which person or people a particular thing belongs to

name: why
trans: ad./ int. 为什么, 你难道不知道（表示反驳、不耐烦等）

sentences.english: Why are you crying?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么哭？

sentences.english: Why do we have to take all these tests?
sentences.chinese: 我们为什么一定要参加这些测验？

sentences.english: ‘She wants to meet you.’ ‘Why?’
sentences.chinese: “她想认识你。”“为什么？”

sentences.english: ‘I won’t be able to come into work tomorrow.’ ‘Why not?’
sentences.chinese: “我明天不能来上班。”“为什么？”

sentences.english: I have no idea why the television isn’t working.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白电视机为什么坏了。

sentences.english: Simon loves you – that’s why he wants to be with you.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙爱你——所以他想和你在一起。

sentences.english: He’s angry with me and I don’t know why.
sentences.chinese: 他生我气了，我不知道为什么。

sentences.english: There’s no reason why we shouldn’t be friends.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有理由不成为朋友。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the reason for something
used when you are surprised or have suddenly realized something

sentences.english: a man with a wide experience of foreign affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交事务经验丰富的人

sentences.english: Our aim is to bring classical music to a wider audience.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目的是把古典音乐带给更多的听众。

detailed_translations.chinese: 广泛的；宽的，广阔的；张大的；远离目标的
detailed_translations.english: including or involving a large variety of different people, things, or situations
opening or spreading as much as possible

sentences.english: the widespread use of chemicals in agriculture
sentences.chinese: 化学品在农业中的广泛使用

detailed_translations.english: existing or happening in many places or situations, or among many people

sentences.english: Have you met my wife?
sentences.chinese: 你见过我的妻子吗？

sentences.english: a refuge for battered wives
sentences.chinese: 受虐待妻子庇护所

sentences.english: his second wife
sentences.chinese: 他的第二任妻子

detailed_translations.english: the woman that a man is married to

name: wild
trans: a. 未开发的，荒凉的；野生的，野的

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["wild animals"]}
sentences.chinese: 野生动物

sentences.english: a field full of wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 遍地野花的田野

sentences.english: animals both wild and domesticated
sentences.chinese: 野生动物和家养动物

detailed_translations.chinese: 野生的；野蛮的；狂热的；荒凉的
detailed_translations.english: living in a natural state, not changed or controlled by people
in natural and free conditions, not kept or controlled by people
if plants run wild, they grow a lot in an uncontrolled way

sentences.english: measures to protect the area’s wildlife
sentences.chinese: 保护该地区野生生物的措施

sentences.english: the destruction of wildlife habitats
sentences.chinese: 野生动植物生存环境的破坏

detailed_translations.english: animals and plants growing in natural conditions

sentences.english: A meeting will be held next Tuesday at 3 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 下星期二下午3点将召开一个会议。

sentences.english: What time will she arrive?
sentences.chinese: 她什么时候到达？

sentences.english: I hope they won’t be late.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们不会迟到。

sentences.english: Maybe by then you will have changed your mind.
sentences.chinese: 也许到那时你已经改变主意了。

sentences.english: All right, I'll forgive you.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我愿意原谅你。

detailed_translations.chinese: 将，会，要〔用于构成将来时〕
detailed_translations.english: used to make future tenses
determination to do something that you have decided to do, even if this is difficult

detailed_translations.chinese: 设法用意志力驱使〔某事发生〕
detailed_translations.english: You use will to say that someone is willing to do something. You use will not or won't to indicate that someone refuses to do something.

name: will
trans: modal v. 将,会(表示将来)；愿意，要

sentences.english: A meeting will be held next Tuesday at 3 p.m.
sentences.chinese: 下星期二下午3点将召开一个会议。

sentences.english: What time will she arrive?
sentences.chinese: 她什么时候到达？

sentences.english: I hope they won’t be late.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们不会迟到。

sentences.english: Maybe by then you will have changed your mind.
sentences.chinese: 也许到那时你已经改变主意了。

sentences.english: All right, I'll forgive you.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我愿意原谅你。

detailed_translations.chinese: 将，会，要〔用于构成将来时〕
detailed_translations.english: used to make future tenses
determination to do something that you have decided to do, even if this is difficult

detailed_translations.chinese: 设法用意志力驱使〔某事发生〕
detailed_translations.english: You use will to say that someone is willing to do something. You use will not or won't to indicate that someone refuses to do something.

name: willing
trans: a. 乐意的； 愿意的

sentences.english: How much are they willing to pay?
sentences.chinese: 他们愿意付多少钱？

detailed_translations.english: prepared to do something, or having no reason to not want to do it

sentences.english: So we do believe we have improved the willingness of our people for our acceptance in the future.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们确实认为，我们已经使群众发生变化，愿意将来接受我们的领导。

sentences.english: But when we focus on God and His ability and willingness to help us in every way -- all our excuses become insignificant.
sentences.chinese: 但是当我们聚焦在神时，他的能力和意愿会用任何方法去帮助我们---我们所有的借口都变得毫无意义。

sentences.english: That provides a measure of willingness to punish, even at a cost to the punisher.
sentences.chinese: 这提供了一个对惩罚的愿意程度的衡量手段，即使惩罚有代价。

name: win won won
trans: n. 获胜，赢得 【一般现在 过去式 过去分词】

sentences.english: The wind blew from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially when it moves strongly or quickly in a current

name: wind wound wound
trans: vt. 缠，连带；蜿蜒，弯曲 【一般现在 过去式 过去分词】

detailed_translations.english: A Windbreaker is a jacket that resists the wind and fits closely at the waist and wrists

sentences.english: They climbed out through the window.
sentences.chinese: 他们从窗户爬出来。

sentences.english: Boost me up so I can look in the window.
sentences.chinese: 把我向上抬起，这样我能朝窗户里面看。

sentences.english: They deducted the cost of the broken window from his allowance.
sentences.chinese: 他们从他的津贴中扣除损坏窗户的费用。

detailed_translations.english: a space or an area of glass in the wall of a building or vehicle that lets in light

sentences.english: It’s too windy for a picnic.
sentences.chinese: 风太大，不适合野餐。

sentences.english: a cold, windy day
sentences.chinese: 一个寒冷的大风天

sentences.english: a windy hillside
sentences.chinese: 当风的山坡

detailed_translations.chinese: 多风的，有风的；腹胀的；吹牛的
detailed_translations.english: if it is windy, there is a lot of wind

sentences.english: a glass of wine
sentences.chinese: 一杯葡萄酒

detailed_translations.english: an alcoholic drink made from grapes, or a type of this drink
to entertain someone well with a meal, wine etc

sentences.english: a butterfly with beautiful markings on its wings
sentences.chinese: 翅膀上有美丽花纹的蝴蝶

sentences.english: The pheasant flapped its wings vigorously.
sentences.chinese: 野鸡猛烈地拍打翅膀。

detailed_translations.english: one of the parts of a bird’s or insect’s body that it uses for flying
to fly somewhere

sentences.english: Five lucky winners will each receive a signed copy of the album.
sentences.chinese: 五位幸运的获胜者每人将得到一张签名专辑。

sentences.english: As a jockey he rode 10 winners.
sentences.chinese: 作为骑师他曾十度驾驭获胜赛马。

detailed_translations.english: a person or animal that has won something

sentences.english: I like winter because we play soccer!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冬天因为我们踢足球！

sentences.english: Well, the worst of the winter should be over.
sentences.chinese: 不过，冬天最糟糕的一段日子总该过去了。

sentences.english: Do you like summer? Yes, but I like winter better.
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢夏天吗？是的，但是我更喜欢冬天。

detailed_translations.english: the season after autumn and before spring, when the weather is coldest

sentences.english: I'll just wipe the table.
sentences.chinese: 我只擦擦桌子。

detailed_translations.english: to remove liquid, dirt, or marks by wiping
a wiping movement with a cloth

sentences.english: Please wire me when you arrive.
sentences.chinese: 你到达后请打电报给我。

sentences.english: He got a wire to go home.
sentences.chinese: 他接到一封让他回家的电报。

detailed_translations.english: to send money electronically
thin metal in the form of a thread, or a piece of this
to send money electronically

sentences.english: a man of great wisdom
sentences.chinese: 一个有大智慧的男人

sentences.english: You can always expect a few words of wisdom from Dave.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫总能冒出几句至理名言。

detailed_translations.english: good sense and judgment, based especially on your experience of life

name: wise
trans: a. 聪明,英明的,有见识的

sentences.english: a wise precaution
sentences.chinese: 明智的预防措施

sentences.english: I don’t think that would be a very wise move (= not be a sensible thing to do ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为那样做不是很明智。

detailed_translations.english: wise decisions and actions are sensible and based on good judgment

name: wish
trans: n. 愿望，祝愿 vt. 希望，想要，祝愿

sentences.english: Close your eyes and make a wish.
sentences.chinese: 闭上眼睛许个愿。

detailed_translations.english: a desire to do something, to have something, or to have something happen
to want something to be true although you know it is either impossible or unlikely

sentences.english: I saw Bob in town with his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我看到鲍勃与他的女朋友一起在镇上。

sentences.english: Put this bag with the others.
sentences.chinese: 把这个包和其他的包放在一起。

sentences.english: I always wear these shoes with this dress.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋子我总是和这条裙子一起穿。

sentences.english: Mix the powder with boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 用开水把粉调和。

sentences.english: You’d better bring your passport with you.
sentences.chinese: 你最好把护照带着。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that two or more people or things are together in the same place

sentences.english: calls for Britain to withdraw from the European Union
sentences.chinese: 要求英国退出欧盟的呼声

detailed_translations.chinese: 缩回， 退出； 撤退
detailed_translations.english: to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this
to stop taking part in an activity, belonging to an organization etc, or to make someone do this

sentences.english: We should have the test results back within 24 hours.
sentences.chinese: 我们24小时之内应该可以拿到化验结果。

sentences.english: He fell sick and died within a matter of weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒了，不出几星期就死了。

sentences.english: Within an hour of our arrival Caroline was starting to complain.
sentences.chinese: 我们到达还没有一小时，卡罗琳就开始抱怨了。

sentences.english: The real dangers to these rebels came from within.
sentences.chinese: 对于这些叛乱分子真正的危险来自内部。

detailed_translations.english: before a certain period of time has passed
Within is also an adverb

sentences.english: After the storm we were without electricity for five days.
sentences.chinese: 暴风雨之后我们断电了五天。

sentences.english: a house without a garden
sentences.chinese: 不带花园的房子

sentences.english: We passed two ruined abbeys, one with a tower and one without.
sentences.chinese: 我们路过两座破落的寺院，一座有塔楼，另一座没有。

sentences.english: I’m getting used to managing without a car.
sentences.chinese: 我已经习惯没有汽车了。

detailed_translations.english: not having something, especially something that is basic or necessary

detailed_translations.chinese: 户外；在外面；没有或不显示某事物

name: witness
trans: v./ n. 目击者，见证人

sentences.english: Police have appealed for witnesses to come forward.
sentences.chinese: 警方呼吁目击者站出来。

sentences.english: an eye witness (= someone who sees an event ) to the robbery
sentences.chinese: 抢劫案的一名目击者

detailed_translations.english: someone who sees a crime or an accident and can describe what happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 目击； 为…作证， 证明
detailed_translations.english: used to introduce an example that proves something you have just mentioned

name: woman women
trans: n.妇女女人【单数 复数】

name: wonder
trans: v. 对…疑惑，感到惊奇,想知道 n. 惊讶,惊叹;奇迹

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

name: wonderful
trans: a. 美妙的，精彩的；了不起的；太好了

sentences.english: It’s wonderful what doctors can do nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 如今医生的本领着实令人称奇。

detailed_translations.chinese: 极好的，精彩的，绝妙的；奇妙的；美妙；胜；神妙
detailed_translations.english: making you admire someone or something very much

sentences.english: Put some more wood on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 往火上再添些木柴。

sentences.english: a polished wood floor
sentences.chinese: 擦得锃亮的木地板

sentences.english: Her house was made of wood .
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子是木头盖的。

detailed_translations.english: the material that trees are made of

sentences.english: a wooden bench
sentences.chinese: 木制长椅

detailed_translations.english: made of wood

sentences.english: the Party’s efforts to woo working class voters
sentences.chinese: 该党拉拢工薪阶层选民的努力

detailed_translations.chinese: 求爱， 求婚； 恳求， 争取
detailed_translations.english: to try to persuade a woman to love you and marry you

sentences.english: a woollen scarf
sentences.chinese: 羊毛围巾

detailed_translations.english: made of wool

sentences.english: Write an essay of about five hundred words.
sentences.chinese: 写一篇约500字的文章。

sentences.english: What does that word mean?
sentences.chinese: 那个单词是什么意思？

sentences.english: ‘Vater’ is the German word for (= that means ) ‘father’.
sentences.chinese: vater在德语中是“父亲”的意思。

sentences.english: Perhaps ‘lucky’ is not exactly the right word .
sentences.chinese: 也许“幸运”一词还不够贴切。

detailed_translations.chinese: [语] 单词；话语；消息；诺言；命令
detailed_translations.english: a single group of letters that are used together with a particular meaning
to use words that are carefully chosen in order to express something

name: work
trans: n. 工作,劳动,事情 vi. 工作;(机器、器官等)运转,活动

sentences.english: There isn’t a lot of work at this time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候工作机会都不多。

sentences.english: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.
sentences.chinese: 他失业有两年了。

sentences.english: More people are in work (= have a job ) than ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money

detailed_translations.chinese: 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进
detailed_translations.english: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job

sentences.english: a 10-hour workday
sentences.chinese: 十小时工作日

detailed_translations.english: the amount of time that you spend working in a day

detailed_translations.chinese: 日常的，工作日的；平凡的

sentences.english: the workers’ revolution
sentences.chinese: 工人阶级革命

detailed_translations.english: the members of the  working class

sentences.english: Women now represent almost 50% of the workforce.
sentences.chinese: 如今女性几乎占全部劳动人口的 50%。

sentences.english: The company is cutting its workforce.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司正在裁员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 劳动力；工人总数，职工总数
detailed_translations.english: all the people who work in a particular industry or company, or are available to work in a particular country or area

sentences.english: More than 80% of unfaithful people have affairs with someone who’d started out as “just a friend, ” very often a workmate.
sentences.chinese: 超过80%的有过偷情史的人都是从跟一些人以“仅仅是朋友”开始的，并且多数是同事。

sentences.english: The link between a positive workmate relationship and the risk of mortality was most notable among those aged between 38 and 43.
sentences.chinese: 与同事建立积极关系和死亡风险之间的联系在38到43岁人群当中最为显著。

sentences.english: The report found more than a fifth of employees have recently confided in a colleague, while a similar number said they would turn to a workmate first.
sentences.chinese: 研究报告指出，超过五分之一的员工最近曾向一位同事倾吐秘密，另外有同样数量的人说他们会最先向同事倾诉。

detailed_translations.english: someone you work with

sentences.english: ...the difficulties facing women in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: …妇女在工作场所中面临的困难。

detailed_translations.english: the room, building etc where you work

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .
sentences.chinese: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。

sentences.english: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .
sentences.chinese: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。

sentences.english: Children are the same the world over .
sentences.chinese: 全世界的孩子都一样。

sentences.english: The book has been published throughout the world .
sentences.chinese: 这本书已在世界各地出版。

sentences.english: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .
sentences.chinese: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。

sentences.english: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系

sentences.english: I decided to take a year off to travel the world .
sentences.chinese: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.english: a crime that shocked the world
sentences.chinese: 震惊全世界的罪行

detailed_translations.chinese: 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活
detailed_translations.english: the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it

sentences.english: a world-famous singer
sentences.chinese: 世界著名歌手

detailed_translations.english: known about by people all over the world

name: worldwide
trans: a. 遍及全球的，世界范围的

sentences.english: His books have sold more than 20 million copies worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 他的书在全世界卖出了两千多万本。

detailed_translations.english: If something exists or happens worldwide, it exists or happens throughout the world

name: worm
trans: n. 软体虫,蠕虫(尤指蚯蚓)

sentences.english: ...a new computer worm that disables security software.
sentences.chinese: …一种使安全软件失灵的新型计算机蠕虫病毒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 虫，蠕虫；蜗杆；螺纹；小人物
detailed_translations.english: a long thin creature with no bones and no legs that lives in soil

detailed_translations.chinese: 使蠕动；给除虫；使缓慢前进

name: worn
trans: a. 用坏,用旧的,疲惫的

sentences.english: a worn patch on the carpet
sentences.chinese: 地毯上一小块磨破的地方

sentences.english: well worn stone steps
sentences.chinese: 残破的石阶

detailed_translations.english: a worn object is old and damaged, especially because it has been used a lot

detailed_translations.chinese: 穿；磨损（wear的过去分词）；佩戴

sentences.english: She gave me a worried look.
sentences.chinese: 她担心地看了我一眼。

sentences.english: His parents must be worried sick (= extremely worried ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的父母肯定担心死了。

detailed_translations.english: unhappy because you keep thinking about a problem, or about something bad that might happen

name: worry
trans: n.& v.烦恼,担忧,发怒,困扰

sentences.english: He’s been a constant source of worry .
sentences.chinese: 他总是让人担心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being anxious about something
to be anxious or unhappy about someone or something, so that you think about them a lot

sentences.english: The traffic is much worse after five o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 5点以后交通拥堵严重得多。

sentences.english: The weather was a lot worse this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年天气糟糕得多。

sentences.english: Conditions will get worse as the winter continues.
sentences.chinese: 随着冬天持续下去，情况会更糟。

sentences.english: High inflation will make unemployment worse.
sentences.chinese: 高通货膨胀率将使失业状况更加严重。

sentences.english: Don’t say anything, you’ll only make matters worse.
sentences.chinese: 什么也别说，说了只会火上浇油。

sentences.english: The bullying got worse and worse until finally he had to leave the school.
sentences.chinese: 他所受的欺侮越来越过分，最后只得离开了学校。

sentences.english: There’s nothing worse than being robbed while you’re on holiday.
sentences.chinese: 没有比度假时被抢劫更糟的了。

sentences.english: The school’s not perfect, but I suppose it could be worse.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校不是十全十美，不过我想还不算太糟吧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 更坏的；更差的；更恶劣的（bad的比较级）；（病情）更重的（ill的比较级）
detailed_translations.english: more unpleasant, bad, or severe

detailed_translations.chinese: 更糟；更坏；更恶劣地；更坏地
detailed_translations.english: in a more severe or serious way than before
something worse

sentences.english: This is the worst recession for fifty years.
sentences.chinese: 这是50年来最严重的一次经济衰退。

sentences.english: My worst fear was that we would run out of food.
sentences.chinese: 我最大的担忧是我们会把食物吃光。

sentences.english: What is the worst possible thing that can happen?
sentences.chinese: 最糟可能会发生什么事？

sentences.english: Aid is being sent to areas that have been worst affected by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 援助物资正在送往受地震影响最严重的地区。

detailed_translations.english: worse than anything or anyone else
most badly

sentences.english: One of the pictures is worth £50,000.
sentences.chinese: 其中一幅画值5万英镑。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

detailed_translations.english: having a value in money, etc.
how good or useful something is or how important it is to people

sentences.english: The house was full of worthless junk.
sentences.chinese: 这房子里堆满了没有用的东西。

sentences.english: The information was worthless to me.
sentences.chinese: 这些资料对我毫无用处。

detailed_translations.english: something that is worthless has no value, importance, or use

sentences.english: He wanted to do a worthwhile job.
sentences.chinese: 他想做有意义的工作。

sentences.english: We decided to give the money to a worthwhile cause (= one that helps people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们决定把这笔钱投入到慈善事业中。

detailed_translations.english: if something is worthwhile, it is important or useful, or you gain something from it

sentences.english: Leeds United were worthy winners of the competition.
sentences.chinese: 利兹联队是比赛当之无愧的获胜者。

sentences.english: a worthy opponent
sentences.chinese: 值得钦佩的对手

sentences.english: A couple of other books are worthy of mention.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些其他的书值得一提

detailed_translations.english: deserving respect from people

name: would
trans: modal v.（will的过去时）将会，打算，想要，过去常常

sentences.english: Would you shut the window, please?
sentences.chinese: 请把窗户关上，好吗？

sentences.english: Would you mind waiting outside?
sentences.chinese: 您在外面等好吗？

sentences.english: Would someone please tell me what is going on?
sentences.chinese: 请问谁能告诉我发生什么事了？

detailed_translations.english: used to ask someone politely to do something

sentences.english: A nurse cleaned and bandaged the wound.
sentences.chinese: 护士把伤口清洗包扎好。

sentences.english: It took several months for his wounds to heal .
sentences.chinese: 他的伤口几个月后才愈合。

sentences.english: The doctor said it was only a flesh wound (= one that does not cut the skin very deeply ) .
sentences.chinese: 医生说那只是皮肉伤。

sentences.english: a gaping wound (= one that is wide and open ) on his thigh
sentences.chinese: 他大腿上裂开的伤口

sentences.english: Gunmen killed two people and wounded six others in an attack today.
sentences.chinese: 在今天的一起袭击事件中，持枪歹徒打死两人，打伤六人。

detailed_translations.english: an injury to your body that is made by a weapon such as a knife or a bullet
to injure someone with a knife, gun etc

sentences.english: a wounded soldier
sentences.chinese: 受伤的士兵

detailed_translations.english: injured by a weapon such as a gun or knife

sentences.english: They run races; they wrestle; and sometimes they have mock fights together.
sentences.chinese: 蚂蚁参加各种赛跑，摔跤，有时还在一起模拟战斗。

detailed_translations.english: to fight someone by holding them and pulling or pushing them

sentences.english: Her face was a mass of wrinkles.
sentences.chinese: 她的脸上布满皱纹。

sentences.english: Alex wrinkled up her nose at the smell.
sentences.chinese: 闻到那股味道，亚历克丝皱起了鼻子。

detailed_translations.english: wrinkles are lines on your face and skin that you get when you are old
if you wrinkle a part of your face, or if it wrinkles, small lines appear on it

sentences.english: He broke his wrist climbing rocks for a cigarette ad.
sentences.chinese: 他为了一个香烟广告攀岩折断了手腕。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body where your hand joins your arm

name: write
trans: (wrote, written) v. 写，书写；写作，著述

sentences.english: I wrote her several letters , but she didn’t reply.
sentences.chinese: 我给她写了几封信，可是她没有回复。

detailed_translations.english: to put words in a letter to someone

sentences.english: Some of his most powerful writing is based on his childhood experiences.
sentences.chinese: 他的一些最震慑人心的作品是根据儿时经历写成的。

detailed_translations.english: books, poems, articles etc, especially those by a particular writer or about a particular subject

sentences.english: You’ve spelt my name wrong.
sentences.chinese: 你把我的名字拼错了。

sentences.english: What? Have I done it wrong ?
sentences.chinese: 什么？我做得不对吗？

sentences.english: I asked him to sort those files, but he’s done it all wrong (= in completely the wrong way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我让他整理这些文件，可是他弄得根本不对。

sentences.english: I must have added it up wrong, then.
sentences.chinese: 那我一定是加错了。

sentences.english: It looks like it's spelled wrong.
sentences.chinese: 看起来像是拼错了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地
detailed_translations.english: not in the correct way
behaviour that is not morally right

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误的；失常的；不适当的
detailed_translations.english: not correct, and not based on true facts
Wrong is also an adverb

sentences.english: The X-ray showed that her leg was not broken.
sentences.chinese: X光片显示她的腿没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: a beam of radiation1 that can go through solid objects and is used for photographing the inside of the body
to photograph the inside of someone’s body using X-rays

sentences.english: a hundred yards away
sentences.chinese: 100码外

sentences.english: an area of 9,000 square yards
sentences.chinese: 面积为9,000平方码的一片区域

detailed_translations.chinese: 院子；码（英制中丈量长度单位，1码=3英尺）；庭院；帆桁
detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length, equal to three feet or 0.91 metres

sentences.english: Alan stretched and yawned.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦伸伸懒腰，打了个呵欠。

sentences.english: Kay shook her head and stifled a yawn (= tried to stop yawning ).
sentences.chinese: 凯摇摇头，忍住呵欠。

detailed_translations.english: to open your mouth wide and breathe in deeply because you are tired or bored
an act of yawning

sentences.english: I arrived here two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我两年前来到这里。

sentences.english: We’ve known each other for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们相识一年多了。

sentences.english: It’s almost a year since Sue died.
sentences.chinese: 休去世快一年了。

sentences.english: Jodi is 15 years old.
sentences.chinese: 约迪15岁。

sentences.english: a three-year business plan
sentences.chinese: 三年的业务发展计划

sentences.english: a four-year-old child
sentences.chinese: 四岁的孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生
detailed_translations.english: a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time

sentences.english: ‘Help me!’ she yelled hysterically.
sentences.chinese: “救救我！”她歇斯底里地大叫。

sentences.english: I yelled out, ‘Here I am!’
sentences.chinese: 我大声喊道:“我在这儿！”

sentences.english: The crowd are on their feet yelling.
sentences.chinese: 观众站着高声呐喊。

sentences.english: He could hear Pete yelling at the top of his voice (= very loudly ).
sentences.chinese: 他听到皮特声嘶力竭地在喊叫。

detailed_translations.english: to shout or say something very loudly, especially because you are frightened, angry, or excited
a loud shout

sentences.english: yellow flowers
sentences.chinese: 黄花

detailed_translations.english: having the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
the colour of butter or the middle part of an egg
to become yellow or make something become yellow

sentences.english: ‘Would you like a sandwich?’ ‘Yes, please.’
sentences.chinese: “你想来个三明治吗？”“好的，谢谢。”

sentences.english: ‘Would you like to come with us?’ ‘Yes, I’d love to.’
sentences.chinese: “你想和我们一起去吗？”“好的，我很乐意。”

detailed_translations.english: used as an answer to say that you want something or want to do something

sentences.english: yesterday’s meeting
sentences.chinese: 昨天的会议

sentences.english: They arrived the day before yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他们前天到的。

detailed_translations.english: the day before today
on or during the day before today

sentences.english: ‘When’s your holiday?’ ‘Oh, not for ages yet.’
sentences.chinese: “你什么时候去休假？”“噢，不知何年何月呢。”

sentences.english: It could be months yet before they know their fate.
sentences.chinese: 可能要好几个月他们才能知道自己的命运。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize how much time will pass before something happens, or how long a situation will continue
used to introduce a fact, situation, or quality that is surprising after what you have just said

sentences.english: a pot of strawberry yogurt
sentences.chinese: 一罐草莓酸奶

detailed_translations.english: a thick liquid food that tastes slightly sour and is made from milk, or an amount of this food

sentences.english: Hi, Kelly. How are you?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，凯利，你好吗？

sentences.english: You must all listen carefully.
sentences.chinese: 你们大家都必须仔细听着。

sentences.english: I have some news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些消息要告诉你们。

sentences.english: The letter is addressed to both of you.
sentences.chinese: 信是寄给你们俩的。

sentences.english: Did Robin give you the money?
sentences.chinese: 罗宾把钱给你了吗？

sentences.english: Only you can make this decision.
sentences.chinese: 只有你才能作这个决定。

sentences.english: You idiot!
sentences.chinese: 你这个白痴！

sentences.english: You boys have got to learn to behave yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 你们这些男孩子必须学着规矩点。

sentences.english: Hey, you over there! Get out of the way!
sentences.chinese: 嘿，说你呢，让开！

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a person or group of people when speaking or writing to them

detailed_translations.chinese: (You)人名；(柬)尤；(东南亚国家华语)猷

sentences.english: a young child
sentences.chinese: 幼儿

sentences.english: He’s younger than me.
sentences.chinese: 他比我小。

sentences.english: You’re too young to get married.
sentences.chinese: 你还太小，不能结婚。

sentences.english: young trees
sentences.chinese: 小树

sentences.english: When I was young, I wanted to be a model.
sentences.chinese: 我年轻时候想当模特。

sentences.english: John was a great footballer in his younger days(= when he was younger ).
sentences.chinese: 约翰年轻时是个很棒的足球运动员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 年轻的；初期的；没有经验的
detailed_translations.english: a young person, plant, or animal has not lived for very long
young people

sentences.english: You should keep in with your colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 你应当与你的同事友好相处。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

sentences.english: This is our room, and yours is just across the hall.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们的房间，你们的在走廊那边。

sentences.english: A lot of people have money problems, but yours are more serious than most people’s.
sentences.chinese: 许多人有财务问题，不过你的问题比大多数人的要严重。

sentences.english: A cash prize of £10,000 or a new car – the choice is yours.
sentences.chinese: 一万英镑的奖金或一辆新车——随你选择。

detailed_translations.chinese: 你（们）的东西；你的责任[义务]；你的家属；来信，尊函
detailed_translations.english: used when speaking or writing to one or more people to refer to something that belongs to them or is connected with them

detailed_translations.chinese: 你（们）的（东西）；信末署名前用语

sentences.english: Look at yourself in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 照照镜子吧。

sentences.english: Come and warm yourselves by the fire.
sentences.chinese: 到火边来暖暖身子。

sentences.english: Have you hurt yourself?
sentences.chinese: 你伤到自己了吗？

sentences.english: Go and buy yourself an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 去给你自己买个冰激凌吧。

detailed_translations.english: used when talking to someone to show that they are affected by their own action

sentences.english: Believe in yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 相信你们自己。

sentences.english: I need not press the urgency of the matter on you, as I konw you are fully aware of it yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 我无需向你们强调此事的急迫性，因为我知道，你们自己对此完全了解。

sentences.english: But what is ultimately most important here is that you are asking the question —not just of me but of yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 但是我在这儿说的最重要的是：你们在问那些问题——不仅是问我，而是在问你们自己。

detailed_translations.chinese: 你们自己；你们本人（yourself的复数）

sentences.english: Despite his youth, he had travelled alone.
sentences.chinese: 他虽然年纪还小，却已独自旅行过了。

sentences.english: The youth of today are the pensioners of tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 今天的年轻人就是明天领养老金的人。

detailed_translations.english: the quality or state of being young

sentences.english: Spread low-fat cream cheese on a whole-wheat bagel (or English muffin) and then top with sliced tomatoes for a yummy sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 低脂全麦面包圈（或英式松饼）脂肪奶酪，然后用美味的三明治切片西红柿涂在上面。

sentences.english: Make something yummy, like popcorn or a cup of special herb tea, to make reading time something your daughter looks forward to.
sentences.chinese: 做些美味的食品，比如说爆米花或一杯特别的香草茶，使你女儿更加期待阅读时光。

sentences.english: So quite quickly you can use your intelligence to change your perception of yummy bread to toxic sludge.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你可以用你的聪明才智修改你对美味的面包印象，把它设为一团有毒污泥吧。

sentences.english: The neck of the zebra was nipped by a lion.
sentences.chinese: 狮子咬断了那头斑马的脖子。

sentences.english: But what if your horse suddenly grows zebra stripes?
sentences.chinese: 可是如果那匹马突然长出了斑马的条纹呢？

sentences.english: Sixty acres of woods and ponds are home to camels, zebra, bison, water buffalo, ostrich and antelope.
sentences.chinese: 六十英亩的森林和池塘是骆驼，斑马，野牛，水牛，鸵鸟和羚羊的家园。

detailed_translations.english: an animal that looks like a horse but has black and white lines all over its body

name: zebra-crossing
trans: 人行横道线（斑马线）【连字符】

sentences.english: Make x greater than or equal to zero.
sentences.chinese: 设x大于或等于零。

detailed_translations.english: the number 0
the number 0

name: zip
trans: v.& n.拉开(或扣上)……的拉链；拉链

sentences.english: The zip on my skirt had broken.
sentences.chinese: 我裙子上的拉链坏了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拉链；活力，精力；尖啸声，撕裂声；一种程序压缩的档案文件格式
detailed_translations.english: two lines of small metal or plastic pieces that slide together to fasten a piece of clothing

detailed_translations.chinese: 拉开或拉上；以尖啸声行进
detailed_translations.english: to fasten something using a zip

sentences.english: ...the metal zipper on his jacket.
sentences.chinese: …他的夹克上的金属拉锁。

detailed_translations.english: two lines of small metal or plastic pieces that slide together to fasten a piece of clothing

sentences.english: San Francisco and Tokyo are both located in earthquake zones.
sentences.chinese: 旧金山和东京都位于地震带。

sentences.english: The government has set up a special economic zone to promote private enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 政府设立了一个经济特区来推动私营企业的发展。

detailed_translations.english: a large area that is different from other areas around it in some way

sentences.english: The road to the zoo turns off here.
sentences.chinese: 通向动物园的路由这儿拐弯。

sentences.english: The parrots in the zoo are popping all the time.
sentences.chinese: 动物园里的鹦鹉一直在生小鹦鹉。

sentences.english: Lionesses bearing cubs in the zoo is nothing new now.
sentences.chinese: 狮子在动物园繁殖早已屡见不鲜了。

detailed_translations.english: a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them

name: zoom
trans: v. 快速移动，迅速前往，猛涨

detailed_translations.chinese: 急速上升；嗡嗡声；[摄] 变焦摄影
detailed_translations.english: a sound made by a vehicle that is travelling fast
